building_short_description_texts.short_description: %placeholder%

short_description.last_approved_text: Shrines to the God of War and Death are constructed upon ritual sites, brimming with magical energy ripe for the channelling.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Shrines to the God of War and Death are constructed upon ritual sites, brimming with magical energy ripe for the channelling.

short_description.last_approved_text: "Awake, awake, awake in fury. Rise thou with terror and twisted countenance, o God of War and Death. For the sands must feel thy wrath and thy subjects, war’s quickening madness. All praise to you!"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "Awake, awake, awake in fury. Rise thou with terror and twisted countenance, o God of War and Death. For the sands must feel thy wrath and thy subjects, war’s quickening madness. All praise to you!"

short_description.last_approved_text: The Liche King proselytises his master, Nagash; his Black Tower juts skyward, a declaration of his dark and cruel intent.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Liche King proselytises his master, Nagash; his Black Tower juts skyward, a declaration of his dark and cruel intent.

short_description.last_approved_text: Alcadizaar's pyramid stands as eternal proof of his sacrifice to prevent Nagash's nefarious plans reaching fruition.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Alcadizaar's pyramid stands as eternal proof of his sacrifice to prevent Nagash's nefarious plans reaching fruition.

short_description.last_approved_text: The King of the Fleetport is forever immortalised by his colossal pyramid.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The King of the Fleetport is forever immortalised by his colossal pyramid.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Liche Lord commanded his great pyramid constructed, so that in life and beyond, all will know his resilience and dedication.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Liche Lord commanded his great pyramid constructed, so that in life and beyond, all will know his resilience and dedication.

short_description.last_approved_text: This monument, much like the man himself, is defiant against the otherwise unstoppable march of Settra's armies.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This monument, much like the man himself, is defiant against the otherwise unstoppable march of Settra's armies.

short_description.last_approved_text: The pyramid of the Imperishable commands the respect and dread of all who gaze upon it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The pyramid of the Imperishable commands the respect and dread of all who gaze upon it.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Eternal Prince promises bounty and prosperity to his lands, in exchange for glorious exultation, naturally.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Eternal Prince promises bounty and prosperity to his lands, in exchange for glorious exultation, naturally.

short_description.last_approved_text: A tumulus of corpses from a long-faded civilisation, now occupied by new denizens.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A tumulus of corpses from a long-faded civilisation, now occupied by new denizens.

short_description.last_approved_text: Spirits of long-dead warriors linger in the mound, eager to take to the battlefield once again.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Spirits of long-dead warriors linger in the mound, eager to take to the battlefield once again.

short_description.last_approved_text: Many a rider has lost their steed in the treacherous drifting sands. The corpses still litter the fast-holding mires.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Many a rider has lost their steed in the treacherous drifting sands. The corpses still litter the fast-holding mires.

short_description.last_approved_text: Countless soldiers have fallen in battle. In the wake of Nagash, they will all rise to fight again.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Countless soldiers have fallen in battle. In the wake of Nagash, they will all rise to fight again.

short_description.last_approved_text: Next to every great temple of the Mortuary Cult lies a covered pit in which its deadly, ophic guardians dwell.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Next to every great temple of the Mortuary Cult lies a covered pit in which its deadly, ophic guardians dwell.

short_description.last_approved_text: Great beasts of burden and horrors of the desert, broken and made to serve their Undead masters.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Great beasts of burden and horrors of the desert, broken and made to serve their Undead masters.

short_description.last_approved_text: The crack of cartilage, the snap, the whine, and the howls of delight define the Bonemaster's work.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The crack of cartilage, the snap, the whine, and the howls of delight define the Bonemaster's work.

short_description.last_approved_text: The gleaming carriages of the Nehekharan chariots shine with the power of the brassworker's mastery.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The gleaming carriages of the Nehekharan chariots shine with the power of the brassworker's mastery.

short_description.last_approved_text: What better ammunition for catapults than the flaming, screaming skulls of the defeated dead?

building_short_description_texts.short_description: What better ammunition for catapults than the flaming, screaming skulls of the defeated dead?

short_description.last_approved_text: The Tomb Kings' citadels dominate the landscape of the desert, fixed and imposing amongst the ever-shifting sands.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Tomb Kings' citadels dominate the landscape of the desert, fixed and imposing amongst the ever-shifting sands.

short_description.last_approved_text: Interred in resplendent and decadent tombs, Nehekharan royalty lie in repose until their kingdom calls them hence.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Interred in resplendent and decadent tombs, Nehekharan royalty lie in repose until their kingdom calls them hence.

short_description.last_approved_text: The lookouts are dark blotches on a horizon of sand; vigilant hawks against the horrors of the desert.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The lookouts are dark blotches on a horizon of sand; vigilant hawks against the horrors of the desert.

short_description.last_approved_text: A column of gleaming bone holds a stern and ominous watch over the shifting and treacherous Nehekharan sands.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A column of gleaming bone holds a stern and ominous watch over the shifting and treacherous Nehekharan sands.

short_description.last_approved_text: From the death houses of Nehekhara, the dead continue to rise to fulfil their as-yet unfinished duty.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From the death houses of Nehekhara, the dead continue to rise to fulfil their as-yet unfinished duty.

short_description.last_approved_text: Those of noble blood are interred in the royal catacombs, awakening to pursue their living aspirations once more.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Those of noble blood are interred in the royal catacombs, awakening to pursue their living aspirations once more.

short_description.last_approved_text: Glittering chambers of worked and preserved bone provide the perfect sanctuary for the resting dead.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Glittering chambers of worked and preserved bone provide the perfect sanctuary for the resting dead.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gaze upon the face of Tomb Kings past - the Hierotitan is the likeness of Nehekhara's sovereigns made massive.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gaze upon the face of Tomb Kings past - the Hierotitan is the likeness of Nehekhara's sovereigns made massive.

short_description.last_approved_text: In the once-resplendent streets of the Nehekharan cities, the dead shuffle about their business as if nothing has changed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In the once-resplendent streets of the Nehekharan cities, the dead shuffle about their business as if nothing has changed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Death is more than a business now, it is life itself!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Death is more than a business now, it is life itself!

short_description.last_approved_text: Great edifices flank the streets of the great Nehekharan cities; monuments to those who came before.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Great edifices flank the streets of the great Nehekharan cities; monuments to those who came before.

short_description.last_approved_text: Those consigned to another world, revived to an insipid parody of life to do their master's bidding.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Those consigned to another world, revived to an insipid parody of life to do their master's bidding.

short_description.last_approved_text: Interred at their liege lord's request, these soldiers are ready to fight again at a moment's notice.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Interred at their liege lord's request, these soldiers are ready to fight again at a moment's notice.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Tomb Kings demanded loyalty from their soldiers until death and beyond. In Unlife, they expect the same.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Tomb Kings demanded loyalty from their soldiers until death and beyond. In Unlife, they expect the same.

short_description.last_approved_text: The abominable Necrosphinx towers above the Nehekharans, offering protection and destruction in exchange for hushed and cowed adoration.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The abominable Necrosphinx towers above the Nehekharans, offering protection and destruction in exchange for hushed and cowed adoration.

short_description.last_approved_text: The punishing desert cannot confine the Tomb Kings; the oceans call and Nehekhara answers!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The punishing desert cannot confine the Tomb Kings; the oceans call and Nehekhara answers!

short_description.last_approved_text: Pushing off from deathly still waters, the Tomb Kings take their unearthly conquest across the placid deep.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Pushing off from deathly still waters, the Tomb Kings take their unearthly conquest across the placid deep.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Nehekharan armada slips across stagnant oceans, delivering fury and domination to the living world beyond.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Nehekharan armada slips across stagnant oceans, delivering fury and domination to the living world beyond.

short_description.last_approved_text: Obelisks tower over the horizon, casting judgement upon any caught in their shadow.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Obelisks tower over the horizon, casting judgement upon any caught in their shadow.

short_description.last_approved_text: The dead all need a place to rest; until they rise again, of course.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The dead all need a place to rest; until they rise again, of course.

short_description.last_approved_text: For the Tomb Kings, there is only eternal Unlife - their sanctuaries are thus a testament to decrepitude.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For the Tomb Kings, there is only eternal Unlife - their sanctuaries are thus a testament to decrepitude.

short_description.last_approved_text: Even the animals and beasts of Nehekhara could not escape Nagash's terrible curse, nor their masters' ever-living adoration.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Even the animals and beasts of Nehekhara could not escape Nagash's terrible curse, nor their masters' ever-living adoration.

short_description.last_approved_text: The deep red mineral glows with a supernatural presence and is much vaunted by the Nehekharan rulers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The deep red mineral glows with a supernatural presence and is much vaunted by the Nehekharan rulers.

short_description.last_approved_text: The tanneries of Nehekhara churn even in Undeath; the stench of acid and death pervades the desolate streets.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The tanneries of Nehekhara churn even in Undeath; the stench of acid and death pervades the desolate streets.

short_description.last_approved_text: An empire as proud and vain as the Tomb Kings' requires magnificent stones to be unearthed in ever-increasing amounts.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: An empire as proud and vain as the Tomb Kings' requires magnificent stones to be unearthed in ever-increasing amounts.

short_description.last_approved_text: All that glitters may not be gold, but there are certainly copious quantities of it adorning Nehekhara's rulers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All that glitters may not be gold, but there are certainly copious quantities of it adorning Nehekhara's rulers.

short_description.last_approved_text: New iron is required for swords, for shields, for war; not all of Nehekhara is left to rot.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: New iron is required for swords, for shields, for war; not all of Nehekhara is left to rot.

short_description.last_approved_text: The great statues of Khemri can only be built from marble drawn by bone-breaking labour in the quarry.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The great statues of Khemri can only be built from marble drawn by bone-breaking labour in the quarry.

short_description.last_approved_text: Smoke and noise billow and bellow from within, as dark and curious transmutations are perfected.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Smoke and noise billow and bellow from within, as dark and curious transmutations are perfected.

short_description.last_approved_text: The dark stones of the Obsidian mines glint with a deathly, otherworldly gleam.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The dark stones of the Obsidian mines glint with a deathly, otherworldly gleam.

short_description.last_approved_text: Even in the vast desert, there are beacons of hope that give way to phantasms of decay.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Even in the vast desert, there are beacons of hope that give way to phantasms of decay.

short_description.last_approved_text: The trappings of life, endlessly recreated in death.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The trappings of life, endlessly recreated in death.

short_description.last_approved_text: In the desert, decay sets in fast. Preservation is key, for food and flesh alike.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In the desert, decay sets in fast. Preservation is key, for food and flesh alike.

short_description.last_approved_text: Even for desert dwellers, the spice merchants are insalubrious. Yet the precious spice, they continually insist, *must* flow.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Even for desert dwellers, the spice merchants are insalubrious. Yet the precious spice, they continually insist, *must* flow.

short_description.last_approved_text: Despite everything, the skeletal populace of Nehekhara do so enjoy a good vintage…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Despite everything, the skeletal populace of Nehekhara do so enjoy a good vintage…

short_description.last_approved_text: More lumber must be sourced to prop up the crumbling edifices of ancient empires…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: More lumber must be sourced to prop up the crumbling edifices of ancient empires…

short_description.last_approved_text: It is not the sting of the Scorpion that kills, but rather its powerful claws and voracious, insatiable appetite.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is not the sting of the Scorpion that kills, but rather its powerful claws and voracious, insatiable appetite.

short_description.last_approved_text: The dead return, unaware that what was once their grave is now also their home.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The dead return, unaware that what was once their grave is now also their home.

short_description.last_approved_text: Mastaba or ‘houses of eternity’ are, typically, flat-roofed tombs. Like all crypts in Nehekhara, once built, settlements soon rose up around them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Mastaba or ‘houses of eternity’ are, typically, flat-roofed tombs. Like all crypts in Nehekhara, once built, settlements soon rose up around them.

short_description.last_approved_text: These expansive, decadent testaments to death now teem with clamorous, violent Unlife.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: These expansive, decadent testaments to death now teem with clamorous, violent Unlife.

short_description.last_approved_text: The dark visions of Unlife that emerge from these tombs will, when done, return.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The dark visions of Unlife that emerge from these tombs will, when done, return.

short_description.last_approved_text: Great monuments to the departed, twisted into far-reaching cities of the dead.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Great monuments to the departed, twisted into far-reaching cities of the dead.

short_description.last_approved_text: The dead return, unaware that what was once their grave is now also their home.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The dead return, unaware that what was once their grave is now also their home.

short_description.last_approved_text: Mastaba or ‘houses of eternity’ are, typically, flat-roofed tombs. Like all crypts in Nehekhara, once built, settlements soon rose up around them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Mastaba or ‘houses of eternity’ are, typically, flat-roofed tombs. Like all crypts in Nehekhara, once built, settlements soon rose up around them.

short_description.last_approved_text: These expansive, decadent testaments to death now teem with clamorous, violent Unlife.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: These expansive, decadent testaments to death now teem with clamorous, violent Unlife.

short_description.last_approved_text: The dark visions of Unlife that emerge from these tombs will, when done, return.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The dark visions of Unlife that emerge from these tombs will, when done, return.

short_description.last_approved_text: Great monuments to the departed, twisted into far-reaching cities of the dead.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Great monuments to the departed, twisted into far-reaching cities of the dead.

short_description.last_approved_text: The City of Kings is an eternal monument to the sovereigns of the desert.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The City of Kings is an eternal monument to the sovereigns of the desert.

short_description.last_approved_text: May the God of the Skies bless the warriors that stride forth in his name.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: May the God of the Skies bless the warriors that stride forth in his name.

short_description.last_approved_text: Deep inside the Pyramid of Nagash is said to be a vault, cursed with Undead magic by the fabled Necromancer himself. Only very few know what secrets it truly holds.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Deep inside the Pyramid of Nagash is said to be a vault, cursed with Undead magic by the fabled Necromancer himself. Only very few know what secrets it truly holds.

short_description.last_approved_text: The heat-bleached bone warriors of grim countenance watch over the battlements, watching for foes through hollowed sockets.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The heat-bleached bone warriors of grim countenance watch over the battlements, watching for foes through hollowed sockets.

short_description.last_approved_text: These lithified walls have seen empires rise and fall, and endured the accession of doom. They hold.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: These lithified walls have seen empires rise and fall, and endured the accession of doom. They hold.

short_description.last_approved_text: The hieroglyphics inscribed upon these battlements channel protective wards, fending off any would-be invaders.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The hieroglyphics inscribed upon these battlements channel protective wards, fending off any would-be invaders.

short_description.last_approved_text: The might of the Khemrian Warsphinx stands astride the cities of the dead, roaring eternally.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The might of the Khemrian Warsphinx stands astride the cities of the dead, roaring eternally.

short_description.last_approved_text: A gem mineshaft is for digging into the mountains in search of precious stones.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A gem mineshaft is for digging into the mountains in search of precious stones.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gold has ever been lusted after by several of the races. Small mines dot the Old World, their owners hoping to strike big.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gold has ever been lusted after by several of the races. Small mines dot the Old World, their owners hoping to strike big.

short_description.last_approved_text: Iron mines are the most common underground works.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Iron mines are the most common underground works.

short_description.last_approved_text: Lumber yards are wholesale markets where wood is stored in great quantities.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Lumber yards are wholesale markets where wood is stored in great quantities.

short_description.last_approved_text: The great winemakers of the world hail from Bretonnia, although there are other races - such as the Elves - who would have something to say about that.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The great winemakers of the world hail from Bretonnia, although there are other races - such as the Elves - who would have something to say about that.

short_description.last_approved_text: "You are required for war. You will not ask questions. You will fight, or die. Perhaps both."

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "You are required for war. You will not ask questions. You will fight, or die. Perhaps both."

short_description.last_approved_text: Beneath a blackened sky, with malice in their soul, the Druchii make ready for war.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Beneath a blackened sky, with malice in their soul, the Druchii make ready for war.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dark Elves do not ride to battle, they ride to slaughter.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dark Elves do not ride to battle, they ride to slaughter.

short_description.last_approved_text: Harpies are an omen of good fortune to the Druchii, and a foul omen to any who must fight them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Harpies are an omen of good fortune to the Druchii, and a foul omen to any who must fight them.

short_description.last_approved_text: The intimidating beasts of Naggaroth are kept as tame as possible under the Beastmaster's torturous tenure.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The intimidating beasts of Naggaroth are kept as tame as possible under the Beastmaster's torturous tenure.

short_description.last_approved_text: From small, ugly beginnings, hatchlings quickly grow into enormous and savage Black Dragons, horrifying and destructive.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From small, ugly beginnings, hatchlings quickly grow into enormous and savage Black Dragons, horrifying and destructive.

short_description.last_approved_text: Cold Ones were discovered in the jungles of Lustria, then tamed - by force - by their Druchii masters.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Cold Ones were discovered in the jungles of Lustria, then tamed - by force - by their Druchii masters.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Dread Knights are a force both terrible and mighty.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Dread Knights are a force both terrible and mighty.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Slave Gate stands, ominous; a cry to attackers that their lives will soon be forfeit.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Slave Gate stands, ominous; a cry to attackers that their lives will soon be forfeit.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dark and grizzly battlements serve as a warning to any who would try to overcome them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dark and grizzly battlements serve as a warning to any who would try to overcome them.

short_description.last_approved_text: Few have ever overcome the horrifying defences of the Druchii, and even then, more horror awaits beyond.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Few have ever overcome the horrifying defences of the Druchii, and even then, more horror awaits beyond.

short_description.last_approved_text: These grim sentries dot the Naggaroth landscape, portending doom to all in their sight.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: These grim sentries dot the Naggaroth landscape, portending doom to all in their sight.

short_description.last_approved_text: Many piteous fools have met death, dashed against the walls of Druchii design.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Many piteous fools have met death, dashed against the walls of Druchii design.

short_description.last_approved_text: Within, scoundrels and blackhearts array, ready for any job worthy of their lurid talents.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Within, scoundrels and blackhearts array, ready for any job worthy of their lurid talents.

short_description.last_approved_text: The ne'er do wells, the forgotten ones, the never-knowns; they reside here.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The ne'er do wells, the forgotten ones, the never-knowns; they reside here.

short_description.last_approved_text: A noble birth will only get you so far. Strength, and domination, will take you all the way to the end.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A noble birth will only get you so far. Strength, and domination, will take you all the way to the end.

short_description.last_approved_text: That the Dark Elf nobles live in luxury is not inequality; they have earned the right through being the strongest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: That the Dark Elf nobles live in luxury is not inequality; they have earned the right through being the strongest.

short_description.last_approved_text: "There are those who dominate, and those who serve. You, pathetic thing, you serve."

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "There are those who dominate, and those who serve. You, pathetic thing, you serve."

short_description.last_approved_text: What is crafted by the Druchii endures the fires of war and the ravages of time.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: What is crafted by the Druchii endures the fires of war and the ravages of time.

short_description.last_approved_text: "If it is Druchii-made, then it is built for endless war. None of this gilded and useless Asur nonsense!"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "If it is Druchii-made, then it is built for endless war. None of this gilded and useless Asur nonsense!"

short_description.last_approved_text: Those who cannot find the strength to be free will have freedom taken from them by those who can.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Those who cannot find the strength to be free will have freedom taken from them by those who can.

short_description.last_approved_text: The services of the Assassins do not come easily, or cheaply, but their shadowy skills are beyond reproach.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The services of the Assassins do not come easily, or cheaply, but their shadowy skills are beyond reproach.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gatherings at this place are… dour affairs, you might say.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gatherings at this place are… dour affairs, you might say.

short_description.last_approved_text: "Essentially, we tie you to this post, and then we torture you. It's… very literal."

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "Essentially, we tie you to this post, and then we torture you. It's… very literal."

short_description.last_approved_text: "You will fight, for our amusement, or you will die. Sorry; I mean, THEN you will die."

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "You will fight, for our amusement, or you will die. Sorry; I mean, THEN you will die."

short_description.last_approved_text: In the Arena, a man is made and unmade a hundred times, until death.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In the Arena, a man is made and unmade a hundred times, until death.

short_description.last_approved_text: They gather under blackened sky, obscured by hoods, to affirm their beliefs in the failing light.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: They gather under blackened sky, obscured by hoods, to affirm their beliefs in the failing light.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Druchii do not hesitate. They take and do what, and who, they want, when they want.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Druchii do not hesitate. They take and do what, and who, they want, when they want.

short_description.last_approved_text: The devious and the delinquent are on full display in this temple of dark pleasures.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The devious and the delinquent are on full display in this temple of dark pleasures.

short_description.last_approved_text: "Yes, welcome, welcome. Would you like some wine? Of course you would…"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "Yes, welcome, welcome. Would you like some wine? Of course you would…"

short_description.last_approved_text: Let the God of Excess take away your pains, and in return give, and give, and give…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Let the God of Excess take away your pains, and in return give, and give, and give…

short_description.last_approved_text: From here, the Dark Elves cast off into the inky waters, intent on practicing unspeakable cruelty.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From here, the Dark Elves cast off into the inky waters, intent on practicing unspeakable cruelty.

short_description.last_approved_text: Those brave - or foolish - enough to venture into Druchii territory may find respite here, however brief.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Those brave - or foolish - enough to venture into Druchii territory may find respite here, however brief.

short_description.last_approved_text: "Cast off, if you dare, for these waters carry some stranger tides…"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "Cast off, if you dare, for these waters carry some stranger tides…"

short_description.last_approved_text: Those creatures raised by the Druchii raise are assuredly as cold-hearted as Naggaroth itself.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Those creatures raised by the Druchii raise are assuredly as cold-hearted as Naggaroth itself.

short_description.last_approved_text: In Naggaroth, there is no such thing as not shooting the messenger…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In Naggaroth, there is no such thing as not shooting the messenger…

short_description.last_approved_text: All dark, terrible highways lead to Naggaroth.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All dark, terrible highways lead to Naggaroth.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Dark Elves do not live in luxury, nor do they want for it - they desire only fury and violence.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Dark Elves do not live in luxury, nor do they want for it - they desire only fury and violence.

short_description.last_approved_text: Where the Druchii dwell, so too does brutality and disharmony make its home.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Where the Druchii dwell, so too does brutality and disharmony make its home.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gnarled and macabre parapets jut skyward, vengefully grasping at the sky.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gnarled and macabre parapets jut skyward, vengefully grasping at the sky.

short_description.last_approved_text: Behind blackened walls, the Druchii plot and wait, ever furious, ever ready for revenge.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Behind blackened walls, the Druchii plot and wait, ever furious, ever ready for revenge.

short_description.last_approved_text: Here the full, horrid nature of the Druchii is on display for all to see.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Here the full, horrid nature of the Druchii is on display for all to see.

short_description.last_approved_text: The ignoble defeated have no life left but one spent in servitude to their new masters.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The ignoble defeated have no life left but one spent in servitude to their new masters.

short_description.last_approved_text: "Buy this one, and I'll throw in a smaller one for half the asking price! You'd be a fool not to!"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "Buy this one, and I'll throw in a smaller one for half the asking price! You'd be a fool not to!"

short_description.last_approved_text: The servants of Hekarti toil away, ever discovering new, blighted ways to channel dark energy.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The servants of Hekarti toil away, ever discovering new, blighted ways to channel dark energy.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Dark Convent offers its services, for the right price - and the price MUST be paid…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Dark Convent offers its services, for the right price - and the price MUST be paid…

short_description.last_approved_text: Give praise to the Lord of Fury upon bended knee. He may listen.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Give praise to the Lord of Fury upon bended knee. He may listen.

short_description.last_approved_text: May the Lord of War smile mercilessly upon your endeavours.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: May the Lord of War smile mercilessly upon your endeavours.

short_description.last_approved_text: A mighty edifice, erected in honour of the God of War himself. Let his fury drive the Druchii to war!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A mighty edifice, erected in honour of the God of War himself. Let his fury drive the Druchii to war!

short_description.last_approved_text: Although one of the less-powerful guilds, every sale of every beast nevertheless goes through them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Although one of the less-powerful guilds, every sale of every beast nevertheless goes through them.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Guild of Alchemists guard their knowledge jealously, for that is what give theme their power.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Guild of Alchemists guard their knowledge jealously, for that is what give theme their power.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfs can carve magical runes into anything, but they can only mark obsidian with permission from the Guild.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarfs can carve magical runes into anything, but they can only mark obsidian with permission from the Guild.

short_description.last_approved_text: Earthenware is useless until it is glazed - making it waterproof, colourful and durable.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Earthenware is useless until it is glazed - making it waterproof, colourful and durable.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is said that only this guild dares trade with the Dawi Zharr and other races even further east.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is said that only this guild dares trade with the Dawi Zharr and other races even further east.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfs have little interest in wine, but fortunately it can be distilled into stronger beverages.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarfs have little interest in wine, but fortunately it can be distilled into stronger beverages.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Empire's greatest engineering minds aim to enter the centre of excellence at the academy.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Empire's greatest engineering minds aim to enter the centre of excellence at the academy.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Badlands are... well, let's just say they're named appropriately. Therefore, when you've got lots of loot you need somewhere safe to stash it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Badlands are... well, let's just say they're named appropriately. Therefore, when you've got lots of loot you need somewhere safe to stash it.

short_description.last_approved_text: Don't stick yer finga inna Squig Nest!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Don't stick yer finga inna Squig Nest!

short_description.last_approved_text: "Let's get down to business and defeat these scum!"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "Let's get down to business and defeat these scum!"

short_description.last_approved_text: Horse bray and wicker, whilst soldiers look anxiously to the horizon. They have all rallied, for battle is near.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Horse bray and wicker, whilst soldiers look anxiously to the horizon. They have all rallied, for battle is near.

short_description.last_approved_text: Great minds come together to discuss the storm that gathers around the Elven race.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Great minds come together to discuss the storm that gathers around the Elven race.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ulthuan is a place of beauty, but Asur Nobles still look to carve out their own slices of peace.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Ulthuan is a place of beauty, but Asur Nobles still look to carve out their own slices of peace.

short_description.last_approved_text: "You must conduct yourself accordingly at court! I won't have you embarrassing me!"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "You must conduct yourself accordingly at court! I won't have you embarrassing me!"

short_description.last_approved_text: The cold, unfeeling stone cares not for friend or foe, and will repel invasion all the same.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The cold, unfeeling stone cares not for friend or foe, and will repel invasion all the same.

short_description.last_approved_text: Magically-warded battlements will hold as long as the Mages can sustain the spell.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Magically-warded battlements will hold as long as the Mages can sustain the spell.

short_description.last_approved_text: Walls enchanted with protective High Magic invariably prove extremely difficult to break.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Walls enchanted with protective High Magic invariably prove extremely difficult to break.

short_description.last_approved_text: Watch Towers dot the mountain redoubts and fortified cities of the Asur; they shall deny any unwanted intrusions.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Watch Towers dot the mountain redoubts and fortified cities of the Asur; they shall deny any unwanted intrusions.

short_description.last_approved_text: Those charged with the defence of Ulthuan royalty will not hesitate or relent in the prosecution of their enemies.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Those charged with the defence of Ulthuan royalty will not hesitate or relent in the prosecution of their enemies.

short_description.last_approved_text: A Dragon slumbers in lifetimes, waking only for mere moments of its life. Do not squander its time.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A Dragon slumbers in lifetimes, waking only for mere moments of its life. Do not squander its time.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ever since Caledor Dragontamer harnessed their power, the incomprehensible power of the Dragons has been a beacon of hope to the Asur.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Ever since Caledor Dragontamer harnessed their power, the incomprehensible power of the Dragons has been a beacon of hope to the Asur.

short_description.last_approved_text: What courteous words are spoken herein always belie a deeper meaning.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: What courteous words are spoken herein always belie a deeper meaning.

short_description.last_approved_text: Those industrious enough to claim free land for their own reap the benefits, so long as they pay tithe to the Phoenix King.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Those industrious enough to claim free land for their own reap the benefits, so long as they pay tithe to the Phoenix King.

short_description.last_approved_text: The manor oversees vast tracts of land, and the Lord knows it is well worked and bountiful.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The manor oversees vast tracts of land, and the Lord knows it is well worked and bountiful.

short_description.last_approved_text: Elven nobility are proud, and some might say arrogant, but their estates are beyond belief!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Elven nobility are proud, and some might say arrogant, but their estates are beyond belief!

short_description.last_approved_text: All Asur need a place to contemplate and prepare, for battle will come here soon.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All Asur need a place to contemplate and prepare, for battle will come here soon.

short_description.last_approved_text: The finest goods in all of Ulthuan, or so they would have you believe.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The finest goods in all of Ulthuan, or so they would have you believe.

short_description.last_approved_text: These artisans have studied their craft for many centuries; they are undisputed experts.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: These artisans have studied their craft for many centuries; they are undisputed experts.

short_description.last_approved_text: A dizzying array of goods and wonderment. The Asur can learn much and enjoy much more, for the right price.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A dizzying array of goods and wonderment. The Asur can learn much and enjoy much more, for the right price.

short_description.last_approved_text: Vellum holds more than just information, it is the key to unlock possibilities.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Vellum holds more than just information, it is the key to unlock possibilities.

short_description.last_approved_text: Each scroll is power. Knowledge is strength, and strength will bring victory.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Each scroll is power. Knowledge is strength, and strength will bring victory.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is magic that sustains Ulthuan, and magic that will save it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is magic that sustains Ulthuan, and magic that will save it.

short_description.last_approved_text: There is surprisingly little pretence - for the High Elves - in a simple space for social gatherings.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There is surprisingly little pretence - for the High Elves - in a simple space for social gatherings.

short_description.last_approved_text: Elven society thrives amongst the columns.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Elven society thrives amongst the columns.

short_description.last_approved_text: A High Elf may find a moment of tranquillity during a measured perambulation.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A High Elf may find a moment of tranquillity during a measured perambulation.

short_description.last_approved_text: "What comedies lie within? What tragedies await? All will be revealed…"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "What comedies lie within? What tragedies await? All will be revealed…"

short_description.last_approved_text: "Come, see the wondrous sights, the dazzling spectacle, the astronomical prices!"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "Come, see the wondrous sights, the dazzling spectacle, the astronomical prices!"

short_description.last_approved_text: High Elven ships carry goods to those with amicable intentions, and destruction to those who would do Ulthuan harm.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: High Elven ships carry goods to those with amicable intentions, and destruction to those who would do Ulthuan harm.

short_description.last_approved_text: "May Mathlann ever guide you back to safe harbour."

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "May Mathlann ever guide you back to safe harbour."

short_description.last_approved_text: From Ulthuan shores to foreign climes, and back again; trade drives life.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From Ulthuan shores to foreign climes, and back again; trade drives life.

short_description.last_approved_text: The collection of exotic fauna for private menageries is an established market - the curious will pay to see them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The collection of exotic fauna for private menageries is an established market - the curious will pay to see them.

short_description.last_approved_text: Once hunted, the creatures are stored in pens and cages for spectators or potential buyers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Once hunted, the creatures are stored in pens and cages for spectators or potential buyers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Busy, noisy markets of the rich and powerful, where buyers vie for ownership of their exotic beasts.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Busy, noisy markets of the rich and powerful, where buyers vie for ownership of their exotic beasts.

short_description.last_approved_text: Elven dye-makers may use the same ingredients, but their methods are more efficient.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Elven dye-makers may use the same ingredients, but their methods are more efficient.

short_description.last_approved_text: Furs are less refined than normal Elven tailoring, but certain warrior-castes appreciate their feral aspect of wearing a good fur.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Furs are less refined than normal Elven tailoring, but certain warrior-castes appreciate their feral aspect of wearing a good fur.

short_description.last_approved_text: Elven gems are exquisitely cut. Dwarfs would argue that theirs are better… the Elves disagree.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Elven gems are exquisitely cut. Dwarfs would argue that theirs are better… the Elves disagree.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gold matters far more to other races, but that weakness can be exploited, which gives the mineral value.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gold matters far more to other races, but that weakness can be exploited, which gives the mineral value.

short_description.last_approved_text: On discovering a substantial seam of gold, a small mine needs fortifying against other treasure-seekers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: On discovering a substantial seam of gold, a small mine needs fortifying against other treasure-seekers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Mining for iron is a very dirty business, takes a special kind of Elf for such mannish labour.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Mining for iron is a very dirty business, takes a special kind of Elf for such mannish labour.

short_description.last_approved_text: A sawyer fashions large hunks of stone, for ease of transport and in preparation for construction.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A sawyer fashions large hunks of stone, for ease of transport and in preparation for construction.

short_description.last_approved_text: A mason is more than a mere sawyer, and is able to form grand shapes from his chosen material.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A mason is more than a mere sawyer, and is able to form grand shapes from his chosen material.

short_description.last_approved_text: There are always those without any formal medical training, who know older ways and which herbs will cure which ills.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There are always those without any formal medical training, who know older ways and which herbs will cure which ills.

short_description.last_approved_text: For herbs that prove difficult to acquire, growing them artificially is the answer.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For herbs that prove difficult to acquire, growing them artificially is the answer.

short_description.last_approved_text: Alchemists study not just what herbs interact with what substance, but why, and then record the lore in tomes for antiquity.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Alchemists study not just what herbs interact with what substance, but why, and then record the lore in tomes for antiquity.

short_description.last_approved_text: Volcanic ore is quite rare, and a precious resource for most due to the way it can interact with certain magic lores.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Volcanic ore is quite rare, and a precious resource for most due to the way it can interact with certain magic lores.

short_description.last_approved_text: Items, such as talismans, made from obsidian often hold arcane power, and so those skilled in its manufacture are widely sought.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Items, such as talismans, made from obsidian often hold arcane power, and so those skilled in its manufacture are widely sought.

short_description.last_approved_text: To be skilled at carving obsidian is to be skilled in sigils and symbols of power, for obsidian soaks in the ensorcelled.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To be skilled at carving obsidian is to be skilled in sigils and symbols of power, for obsidian soaks in the ensorcelled.

short_description.last_approved_text: Even small farmsteads in Elven lands are often things of beauty, whether green fields or virgin glaciers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Even small farmsteads in Elven lands are often things of beauty, whether green fields or virgin glaciers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Larger animal husbandry and crop management is taken on by larger noble houses - or their servants at any rate.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Larger animal husbandry and crop management is taken on by larger noble houses - or their servants at any rate.

short_description.last_approved_text: Elven appetites veer to vegetarian - they do not like to sully their digestion with the flesh of lesser species. However, there are exceptions…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Elven appetites veer to vegetarian - they do not like to sully their digestion with the flesh of lesser species. However, there are exceptions…

short_description.last_approved_text: Elven vases and other ceramics are some of the most beautiful artefacts in the world.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Elven vases and other ceramics are some of the most beautiful artefacts in the world.

short_description.last_approved_text: Salt is mined. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job, but perfect for the underclasses.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Salt is mined. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job, but perfect for the underclasses.

short_description.last_approved_text: Strange, exotic - even sensuous - smells fill the air at this market.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Strange, exotic - even sensuous - smells fill the air at this market.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gathered from the far flung east, spices from many foreign realms can be traded here.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gathered from the far flung east, spices from many foreign realms can be traded here.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Races from the east come to trade and bring with them exotic wares and spices.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wood is blessed before it is felled, for that is the Elven way.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wood is blessed before it is felled, for that is the Elven way.

short_description.last_approved_text: Even small vineyards are great and treasured enterprises in Elven lands.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Even small vineyards are great and treasured enterprises in Elven lands.

short_description.last_approved_text: Elven vintners are always powerful nobles for such is the stock in their commodity.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Elven vintners are always powerful nobles for such is the stock in their commodity.

short_description.last_approved_text: Elven vine estates are large, their recipes said to be secrets shared only with the goddesses.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Elven vine estates are large, their recipes said to be secrets shared only with the goddesses.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Vintners' Guild is one of the more powerful Elven merchant cartels, able to even influence those at court.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Vintners' Guild is one of the more powerful Elven merchant cartels, able to even influence those at court.

short_description.last_approved_text: Even the noble High Elves must have humble beginnings. Well, some of them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Even the noble High Elves must have humble beginnings. Well, some of them.

short_description.last_approved_text: Though the Sundering left its scars on the world, the High Elves endeavour to rebuild and endure.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Though the Sundering left its scars on the world, the High Elves endeavour to rebuild and endure.

short_description.last_approved_text: The tower strikes defiantly into the sky, and the Elven settlement flourishes in its shade.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The tower strikes defiantly into the sky, and the Elven settlement flourishes in its shade.

short_description.last_approved_text: Look upon an Asur city, and let none think the High Elves any less resplendent or mighty.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Look upon an Asur city, and let none think the High Elves any less resplendent or mighty.

short_description.last_approved_text: The great Elven capitals stand proud and vast, so that all may gaze in wonderment.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The great Elven capitals stand proud and vast, so that all may gaze in wonderment.

short_description.last_approved_text: They say that nothing can match that from an Elven forge. 'They' are the High Elves, of course.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: They say that nothing can match that from an Elven forge. 'They' are the High Elves, of course.

short_description.last_approved_text: Only the most esteemed of High Elves wear ithilmar. It is light, durable, and magical, but exceedingly rare.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Only the most esteemed of High Elves wear ithilmar. It is light, durable, and magical, but exceedingly rare.

short_description.last_approved_text: A healthy horse is a mighty horse, and a mighty horse is vital indeed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A healthy horse is a mighty horse, and a mighty horse is vital indeed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Mastery of their mount is vital to any would-be champion of the Asur.

short_description.last_approved_text: A simple shrine, to pray homage to the god of gods.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A simple shrine, to pray homage to the god of gods.

short_description.last_approved_text: "Make a little effort - you stand before an altar to the greatest god!"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "Make a little effort - you stand before an altar to the greatest god!"

short_description.last_approved_text: Splendour and magnificence, to pay glory to Asuryan.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Splendour and magnificence, to pay glory to Asuryan.

short_description.last_approved_text: To Khaine go the dregs, the spent slaves, the useless; kicked or thrown into His bloody pit.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To Khaine go the dregs, the spent slaves, the useless; kicked or thrown into His bloody pit.

short_description.last_approved_text: The lucky ones that hang from the giant hooks are already dead before they enter the abattoir.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The lucky ones that hang from the giant hooks are already dead before they enter the abattoir.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A burning brazier of made from entwined black metal, heated not by fire but with souls.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Below decks on the Black Ark is a furnace, Khaine's face fashioned into its doors, his eyes glowing from the souls within.
