building_short_description_texts.short_description: Saurus cohorts on garrison duty are tasked with protecting the temple-cities and the Old Ones' legacy.

short_description.last_approved_text: An obsidian turntable inscribed with hieroglyphs; when correctly aligned a new Geomantic pathway can be forged.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: An obsidian turntable inscribed with hieroglyphs; when correctly aligned a new Geomantic pathway can be forged.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Lodestone acts like a prism, collecting branching Geomantic power lines and redirecting them at the Mage-Priests' will.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Lodestone acts like a prism, collecting branching Geomantic power lines and redirecting them at the Mage-Priests' will.

short_description.last_approved_text: The tall obsidian pylons act as signal boosters, channelling Geomantic energy that might otherwise splice off and fade back into the aether.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The tall obsidian pylons act as signal boosters, channelling Geomantic energy that might otherwise splice off and fade back into the aether.

short_description.last_approved_text: These needle-like spires are constructed to maintain the flow of Geomantic power.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: These needle-like spires are constructed to maintain the flow of Geomantic power.

short_description.last_approved_text: The locus is a prism - a large geometric crystal floating in a constantly revolving state - and a junction where lines of power merge.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The locus is a prism - a large geometric crystal floating in a constantly revolving state - and a junction where lines of power merge.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skink hunters will oft make secret camps on well-trodden routes they know prey will roam.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skink hunters will oft make secret camps on well-trodden routes they know prey will roam.

short_description.last_approved_text: Agriculture is not an alien concept to Lizardmen, they farm many breeds of insects, often in great domes that buzz with sound of swarms.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Agriculture is not an alien concept to Lizardmen, they farm many breeds of insects, often in great domes that buzz with sound of swarms.

short_description.last_approved_text: Cooling halls that shelter meat away from the Chotec's rage, the sun, helps keep the food relatively fresh.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Cooling halls that shelter meat away from the Chotec's rage, the sun, helps keep the food relatively fresh.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Skink districts are busy areas, where markets thrive, goods are exchanged and reptiles from foreign cities meet to trade.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Skink districts are busy areas, where markets thrive, goods are exchanged and reptiles from foreign cities meet to trade.

short_description.last_approved_text: The barrios are another part of the heavily-populated Skink districts, where many crafts are practised and artefacts created.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The barrios are another part of the heavily-populated Skink districts, where many crafts are practised and artefacts created.

short_description.last_approved_text: The labour districts are where the Skink handlers farm out Kroxigor labour for favour or a price.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The labour districts are where the Skink handlers farm out Kroxigor labour for favour or a price.

short_description.last_approved_text: Personifications of the Old Ones are frowned upon in some temple-cities, while others embrace the great statues as a place to focus their reverence.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Personifications of the Old Ones are frowned upon in some temple-cities, while others embrace the great statues as a place to focus their reverence.

short_description.last_approved_text: Plazas are critical routes through the temple-cities, the Grand Plaza typically being the main causeway from the gate to the central ziggurat.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Plazas are critical routes through the temple-cities, the Grand Plaza typically being the main causeway from the gate to the central ziggurat.

short_description.last_approved_text: Drifting glades revolve in an eternal dance, where the Slann contemplate when the glades align in auspicious patterns.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Drifting glades revolve in an eternal dance, where the Slann contemplate when the glades align in auspicious patterns.

short_description.last_approved_text: Pliodons are large, river-going creatures that seldom move on to land. They are used by the Lizardmen to ferry cohorts across bodies of water.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Pliodons are large, river-going creatures that seldom move on to land. They are used by the Lizardmen to ferry cohorts across bodies of water.

short_description.last_approved_text: Natural harbours fashioned long ago by the Old Ones themselves, and now used by their servants.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Natural harbours fashioned long ago by the Old Ones themselves, and now used by their servants.

short_description.last_approved_text: Temple-cities close to the coast or major rivers will have designated port districts, where sea-going vessels of the Lizardmen make anchor.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Temple-cities close to the coast or major rivers will have designated port districts, where sea-going vessels of the Lizardmen make anchor.

short_description.last_approved_text: The collecting of Itzl's creations, especially the colour changing chameleons, is deigned of use by the Slann.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The collecting of Itzl's creations, especially the colour changing chameleons, is deigned of use by the Slann.

short_description.last_approved_text: Rarer Terradons distinguished by different beaks or patina are caged until tamed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Rarer Terradons distinguished by different beaks or patina are caged until tamed.

short_description.last_approved_text: The great paddocks are where creatures are displayed and Skink Priests come with the blessings of Itzl and Conalxa.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The great paddocks are where creatures are displayed and Skink Priests come with the blessings of Itzl and Conalxa.

short_description.last_approved_text: Blood rock a key ingredient in creating dyes for daubing on scales.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Blood rock a key ingredient in creating dyes for daubing on scales.

short_description.last_approved_text: Blood rock mines are larger excavation sites, made when substantial cinnabar deposits are discovered.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Blood rock mines are larger excavation sites, made when substantial cinnabar deposits are discovered.

short_description.last_approved_text: Much blood rock is collected, ground with grit and thrown into sandstone vats, to create the dye.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Much blood rock is collected, ground with grit and thrown into sandstone vats, to create the dye.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wearing the warmblood's skin is a good way to intimidate warmblood foes.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wearing the warmblood's skin is a good way to intimidate warmblood foes.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skinks gemcutters are always in demand, as powerful crystals are used throughout the Lizardmen realms.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skinks gemcutters are always in demand, as powerful crystals are used throughout the Lizardmen realms.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gold holds a strange value to warmbloods, but for the Lizardmen it is a highly conductive and useful material.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gold holds a strange value to warmbloods, but for the Lizardmen it is a highly conductive and useful material.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gold is melted down on thermal streams and then fashioned into any image the Mage-Priests desire.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gold is melted down on thermal streams and then fashioned into any image the Mage-Priests desire.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ore is taken from deep pits or mines; Kroxigors perform the labour but Skinks may have to work in smaller shafts.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Ore is taken from deep pits or mines; Kroxigors perform the labour but Skinks may have to work in smaller shafts.

short_description.last_approved_text: Using methods described on plaque, the ore is heated and weapons can then be fashioned.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Using methods described on plaque, the ore is heated and weapons can then be fashioned.

short_description.last_approved_text: Marble is used in some form in certain temple-cities, but is not always the preferred material.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Marble is used in some form in certain temple-cities, but is not always the preferred material.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skink adepts with a proficiency for stone carve images of the Old Ones into the walls of temple-cities.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skink adepts with a proficiency for stone carve images of the Old Ones into the walls of temple-cities.

short_description.last_approved_text: Some Skinks have an innate knowledge of which jungle berries to use to salve bites and other nasty injuries.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Some Skinks have an innate knowledge of which jungle berries to use to salve bites and other nasty injuries.

short_description.last_approved_text: Jungle lotus is one of the most potent of plants, and only a few know where it grows most regularly.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Jungle lotus is one of the most potent of plants, and only a few know where it grows most regularly.

short_description.last_approved_text: Jungle clearings and waterholes are where prey will gather; these are often protected by Lizardmen as a form of husbandry.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Jungle clearings and waterholes are where prey will gather; these are often protected by Lizardmen as a form of husbandry.

short_description.last_approved_text: Lizardmen, especially Saurus, are meat-eaters, and so many animals are bred to slaughter and consume.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Lizardmen, especially Saurus, are meat-eaters, and so many animals are bred to slaughter and consume.

short_description.last_approved_text: Insects are a large part of the Lizardmen diet; these jungles have both in abundance.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Insects are a large part of the Lizardmen diet; these jungles have both in abundance.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skink potters are surprisingly adept, creating not just practical receptacles but often works of art.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skink potters are surprisingly adept, creating not just practical receptacles but often works of art.

short_description.last_approved_text: Kilns are large Geomantic energy-powered ovens capable of mass-production.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Kilns are large Geomantic energy-powered ovens capable of mass-production.

short_description.last_approved_text: Salt is mined. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job - send in the Kroxigors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Salt is mined. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job - send in the Kroxigors.

short_description.last_approved_text: When the Lizardmen need wood, the jungle provides.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When the Lizardmen need wood, the jungle provides.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wood in its natural form is hard to work with, so the timber mills turn it into lumber ready for sale.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wood in its natural form is hard to work with, so the timber mills turn it into lumber ready for sale.

short_description.last_approved_text: Found deep in the barrios, lumber from the jungle is bartered across the reptilian realms.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Found deep in the barrios, lumber from the jungle is bartered across the reptilian realms.

short_description.last_approved_text: When squashed, certain berries and grapes make a pleasant drink somewhat above swamp water.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When squashed, certain berries and grapes make a pleasant drink somewhat above swamp water.

short_description.last_approved_text: Once the draft is made, it is stored in great vats, where it will ferment, often sending Saurus into a groggy state!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Once the draft is made, it is stored in great vats, where it will ferment, often sending Saurus into a groggy state!

short_description.last_approved_text: When ready, Skink factors sell the draft in clay pots to others with a taste for it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When ready, Skink factors sell the draft in clay pots to others with a taste for it.

short_description.last_approved_text: In in times of war, the large lagoons in the Saurus caverns can be adjusted to gestate many warrior cohorts simultaneously.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In in times of war, the large lagoons in the Saurus caverns can be adjusted to gestate many warrior cohorts simultaneously.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skink aggregators believe that cooler spawning climates found under the ground can produce better quality warriors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skink aggregators believe that cooler spawning climates found under the ground can produce better quality warriors.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Temple Guard are placed in a dedicated barracks where they train and bask awaiting their sacred duty.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Temple Guard are placed in a dedicated barracks where they train and bask awaiting their sacred duty.

short_description.last_approved_text: In blessed pools will the Slann bathe or stare - often for decades - until enlightenment is found.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In blessed pools will the Slann bathe or stare - often for decades - until enlightenment is found.

short_description.last_approved_text: A small gathering of cohorts, usually a settlement along the Geomantic Web in thrall to a more prominent temple-city.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A small gathering of cohorts, usually a settlement along the Geomantic Web in thrall to a more prominent temple-city.

short_description.last_approved_text: A minor node on a smaller tributary of the Geomantic Web, comprising a lone ziggurat, often ruled by a later generation Mage-Priest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A minor node on a smaller tributary of the Geomantic Web, comprising a lone ziggurat, often ruled by a later generation Mage-Priest.

short_description.last_approved_text: Located on a lesser tributary of the Geomantic Web, comprising a ziggurat and surrounding barrios, and often ruled by a later generation Mage-Priest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Located on a lesser tributary of the Geomantic Web, comprising a ziggurat and surrounding barrios, and often ruled by a later generation Mage-Priest.

short_description.last_approved_text: The temple-cities are where the Lizardmen spawn and live. They scatter the Southlands and Lustria, comprising of great pyramids, barrios and plazas.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The temple-cities are where the Lizardmen spawn and live. They scatter the Southlands and Lustria, comprising of great pyramids, barrios and plazas.

short_description.last_approved_text: All temple-cities are nodes in the Geomantic Web, but some are true nexus points - massive cities and major tributaries in power.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All temple-cities are nodes in the Geomantic Web, but some are true nexus points - massive cities and major tributaries in power.

short_description.last_approved_text: Spawning ponds are used for lower ranking Skink castes - the ponds themselves are small bodies of water, although many in number.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Spawning ponds are used for lower ranking Skink castes - the ponds themselves are small bodies of water, although many in number.

short_description.last_approved_text: The hunter-caste spawning pools hold thousands of eggs that quickly gestate new Skinks, with a subtle temperature rise, at a Slann's command.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The hunter-caste spawning pools hold thousands of eggs that quickly gestate new Skinks, with a subtle temperature rise, at a Slann's command.

short_description.last_approved_text: Elevated pools, closer to the central pyramid, are more likely to gestate specialist Skink castes and their Kroxigor bodyguards.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Elevated pools, closer to the central pyramid, are more likely to gestate specialist Skink castes and their Kroxigor bodyguards.

short_description.last_approved_text: Located at the peak of the ziggurats are the Star Chambers, where the prominent Mage-priests ponder in their trance-like slumber.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Located at the peak of the ziggurats are the Star Chambers, where the prominent Mage-priests ponder in their trance-like slumber.

short_description.last_approved_text: Certain barrios in the temple-city are where Skink artisans reside, arguably the most important of which are the weapon-crafters.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Certain barrios in the temple-city are where Skink artisans reside, arguably the most important of which are the weapon-crafters.

short_description.last_approved_text: The hatcheries are tall pylons that nearly match the peak of the central pyramid. Within their tips are nests containing many Terradon eggs.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The hatcheries are tall pylons that nearly match the peak of the central pyramid. Within their tips are nests containing many Terradon eggs.

short_description.last_approved_text: Shrines to certain lesser or forgotten Old Ones are scattered throughout the temple-cities; no matter how insignificant, they are still highly revered.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Shrines to certain lesser or forgotten Old Ones are scattered throughout the temple-cities; no matter how insignificant, they are still highly revered.

short_description.last_approved_text: Temples of the Old Ones populated by many Skink acolytes and dedicated Mage-Priests are found throughout the temple-cities.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Temples of the Old Ones populated by many Skink acolytes and dedicated Mage-Priests are found throughout the temple-cities.

short_description.last_approved_text: The great pyramids and temples are normally clustered at the end of the grand plazas at the centre of the temple-cities.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The great pyramids and temples are normally clustered at the end of the grand plazas at the centre of the temple-cities.

short_description.last_approved_text: Where Skinks come to show devotion to the serpentine Old One god, and warm-blooded prisoners are put to the sword.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Where Skinks come to show devotion to the serpentine Old One god, and warm-blooded prisoners are put to the sword.

short_description.last_approved_text: The site of many, many blood sacrifices of Lizardmen foes to the satisfy the Serpent God's eternal thirst.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The site of many, many blood sacrifices of Lizardmen foes to the satisfy the Serpent God's eternal thirst.

short_description.last_approved_text: A great fall crests the top of Sotek's pyramid, but it is not water that cascades down.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A great fall crests the top of Sotek's pyramid, but it is not water that cascades down.

short_description.last_approved_text: At her temple within Ghrond's Dark Convent, Hekarti pays close attention to her adherents' desires.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: At her temple within Ghrond's Dark Convent, Hekarti pays close attention to her adherents' desires.

short_description.last_approved_text: One of the most ancient waystones, from the time of Aenarion; the soul of a great champion resides within.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: One of the most ancient waystones, from the time of Aenarion; the soul of a great champion resides within.

short_description.last_approved_text: Such precious waystones are increasingly rare and so are guarded by dedicated warriors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Such precious waystones are increasingly rare and so are guarded by dedicated warriors.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Old Ones left behind many instructions to be discovered, recorded on plaques and left in repositories.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Old Ones left behind many instructions to be discovered, recorded on plaques and left in repositories.

short_description.last_approved_text: Such important troves of Old One lore are sacrosanct to the Great Plan and must be protected.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Such important troves of Old One lore are sacrosanct to the Great Plan and must be protected.

short_description.last_approved_text: Warpstone is concentrated Dark Magic, which has the tendency to attract more of itself.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Warpstone is concentrated Dark Magic, which has the tendency to attract more of itself.

short_description.last_approved_text: Precious Warpstone seams, once found, will need defending against thieves.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Precious Warpstone seams, once found, will need defending against thieves.

short_description.last_approved_text: This small settlement is claimed by a rogue force.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This small settlement is claimed by a rogue force.

short_description.last_approved_text: This settlement is claimed by a rogue force.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This settlement is claimed by a rogue force.

short_description.last_approved_text: A sprawling settlement claimed by a rogue force.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A sprawling settlement claimed by a rogue force.

short_description.last_approved_text: The mountain peaks of Parravon are known for their large bird roosts, but even more famous for pegasi.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The mountain peaks of Parravon are known for their large bird roosts, but even more famous for pegasi.

short_description.last_approved_text: Lower-ranking Clan Eshin rats remain apart from the other clans' rabble in hidden burrows that remain Eshin territory no matter what the dominant Warlord believes.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Lower-ranking Clan Eshin rats remain apart from the other clans' rabble in hidden burrows that remain Eshin territory no matter what the dominant Warlord believes.

short_description.last_approved_text: Unbeknownst to most - often even the ranking Warlord - Clan Eshin has their own outpost or den within the lair, where Eshin members gather to plot.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Unbeknownst to most - often even the ranking Warlord - Clan Eshin has their own outpost or den within the lair, where Eshin members gather to plot.

short_description.last_approved_text: The business of secret murder makes the establishment of escape routes, secret tunnels and concealed hidey-holes a necessity.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The business of secret murder makes the establishment of escape routes, secret tunnels and concealed hidey-holes a necessity.

short_description.last_approved_text: The pit is where many of the Clanrat packs congregate in a writhing mass to eat and enact their own petty plans and downfalls.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The pit is where many of the Clanrat packs congregate in a writhing mass to eat and enact their own petty plans and downfalls.

short_description.last_approved_text: Favoured Clanrats, or those that have clawed their way through the vicious hierarchy, have a place in the barracks and access to better arms.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Favoured Clanrats, or those that have clawed their way through the vicious hierarchy, have a place in the barracks and access to better arms.

short_description.last_approved_text: Deep in the warrens are the clan armouries; heavily-guarded by Stormvermin, it is the first place the Skavenslaves ransack.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Deep in the warrens are the clan armouries; heavily-guarded by Stormvermin, it is the first place the Skavenslaves ransack.

short_description.last_approved_text: Should the things invade, devious tunnel design forces them to chokepoints, where Warp-fire emplacements scorch the intruders to death.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Should the things invade, devious tunnel design forces them to chokepoints, where Warp-fire emplacements scorch the intruders to death.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ingenious back-tunnels allow the clans to move their rodents quickly through the maze-like warrens.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Ingenious back-tunnels allow the clans to move their rodents quickly through the maze-like warrens.

short_description.last_approved_text: Clan Moulder-rejected Rat Ogres and others are conscripted and chained to key defensive junctions and outposts - their handlers unleashing them at trespassers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Clan Moulder-rejected Rat Ogres and others are conscripted and chained to key defensive junctions and outposts - their handlers unleashing them at trespassers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Shrill alarms sound off should detection sensors be triggered by incorrect tail swishes; only those in the clan know the right combination.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Shrill alarms sound off should detection sensors be triggered by incorrect tail swishes; only those in the clan know the right combination.

short_description.last_approved_text: Jagged, irregular, wooden and metal fortifications surround the largest and most important entrances to the lair.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Jagged, irregular, wooden and metal fortifications surround the largest and most important entrances to the lair.

short_description.last_approved_text: The most basic way of generating power for even the poorest clans is through rows of slave wheels, where Skavenslaves are run to exhaustion.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The most basic way of generating power for even the poorest clans is through rows of slave wheels, where Skavenslaves are run to exhaustion.

short_description.last_approved_text: In the piston house, Warp-steam driven pistons power the foundries, laboratories and feeding dens that ratmen society relies.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In the piston house, Warp-steam driven pistons power the foundries, laboratories and feeding dens that ratmen society relies.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skaven have quickly adopted the generator systems of the Greater Clans which use Skavenslaves on treadmills to generate power.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skaven have quickly adopted the generator systems of the Greater Clans which use Skavenslaves on treadmills to generate power.

short_description.last_approved_text: While energy generation is rarely a problem for Skaven society, power storage can be a challenge unless the warren has capacitors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: While energy generation is rarely a problem for Skaven society, power storage can be a challenge unless the warren has capacitors.

short_description.last_approved_text: A Warpstone reactor is the pinnacle of Clan Skryre engineering, hence they charge a premium, as well as a hefty vassal contract.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A Warpstone reactor is the pinnacle of Clan Skryre engineering, hence they charge a premium, as well as a hefty vassal contract.

short_description.last_approved_text: Large caverns, close to the surface, are often used as workshops, where Skaven war machines are built, laboured on by thousands of expendable slaves.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Large caverns, close to the surface, are often used as workshops, where Skaven war machines are built, laboured on by thousands of expendable slaves.

short_description.last_approved_text: Warpstone is sent here for refinement and used in myriad other applications. Warlock Engineers and Warp-smiths learn their craft here.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Warpstone is sent here for refinement and used in myriad other applications. Warlock Engineers and Warp-smiths learn their craft here.

short_description.last_approved_text: Warp-turbines cost thousands of Skavenslave lives while in operation; a small price to pay for the development of the infamous Doomwheel.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Warp-turbines cost thousands of Skavenslave lives while in operation; a small price to pay for the development of the infamous Doomwheel.

short_description.last_approved_text: The warrens are full-to-teeming with ratlings and immature vermin yet to prove themselves. Survival in this environment is brutal, harsh and often fatal.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The warrens are full-to-teeming with ratlings and immature vermin yet to prove themselves. Survival in this environment is brutal, harsh and often fatal.

short_description.last_approved_text: Nest-nurseries are where powerful or special pups are taken to ensure they are not eaten by their ravenous siblings, or indeed their parents.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Nest-nurseries are where powerful or special pups are taken to ensure they are not eaten by their ravenous siblings, or indeed their parents.

short_description.last_approved_text: While some broodmothers are vaunted, such as the bearers of Stormvermin and other higher-caste specimens, the majority are kept in filthy pits.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: While some broodmothers are vaunted, such as the bearers of Stormvermin and other higher-caste specimens, the majority are kept in filthy pits.

short_description.last_approved_text: In more advanced Clan Moulder facilities, growth vats are used to enlarge and engorge certain specimens, including Rat Ogres.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In more advanced Clan Moulder facilities, growth vats are used to enlarge and engorge certain specimens, including Rat Ogres.

short_description.last_approved_text: Although Clan Moulder's Hell Pit is the largest facility of its kind, many Skaven clans have laboratories dotted throughout the Under-Empire.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Although Clan Moulder's Hell Pit is the largest facility of its kind, many Skaven clans have laboratories dotted throughout the Under-Empire.

short_description.last_approved_text: From his raised platform, the taskmaster guides and directs the noisome hordes, setting tasks or mustering the Clanrats for war.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From his raised platform, the taskmaster guides and directs the noisome hordes, setting tasks or mustering the Clanrats for war.

short_description.last_approved_text: The overseer chitters at the taskmaster, who in turn takes his anger out on the Clanrats below - Skaven society as microcosm.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The overseer chitters at the taskmaster, who in turn takes his anger out on the Clanrats below - Skaven society as microcosm.

short_description.last_approved_text: The screaming foundries are where the Grey Seers set their Warpsmiths and slaves to cast the vile bells of the Horned Rat.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The screaming foundries are where the Grey Seers set their Warpsmiths and slaves to cast the vile bells of the Horned Rat.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Clanrats of Pestilens are baptised in a font known as the Pox Cauldron; their pustules swell and their transformation into Plague Monks begins.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Clanrats of Pestilens are baptised in a font known as the Pox Cauldron; their pustules swell and their transformation into Plague Monks begins.

short_description.last_approved_text: From the unholy pulpits the Plague Priests chant and preach to their diseased congregation - sowing animus, disease and hatred of the no-furs.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From the unholy pulpits the Plague Priests chant and preach to their diseased congregation - sowing animus, disease and hatred of the no-furs.

short_description.last_approved_text: Within the fell abbey, the Plague Priests preach to the frenzied plague monks amidst the putrid fog of the swaying censers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Within the fell abbey, the Plague Priests preach to the frenzied plague monks amidst the putrid fog of the swaying censers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Where the Skaven lairs meet the sea are ragged wharfs on which many thousands of Skavenslaves are offloaded from one clan to another.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Where the Skaven lairs meet the sea are ragged wharfs on which many thousands of Skavenslaves are offloaded from one clan to another.

short_description.last_approved_text: The under-docks are harbours where slave-barges, captured thing-navies and all kinds of commercial products from all over the Under-Empire are delivered.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The under-docks are harbours where slave-barges, captured thing-navies and all kinds of commercial products from all over the Under-Empire are delivered.

short_description.last_approved_text: Home to the bell-fleets - the Lords of Decay's great navies - these are hidden places, giving the sea-clans advantage over the others.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Home to the bell-fleets - the Lords of Decay's great navies - these are hidden places, giving the sea-clans advantage over the others.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skaven collect exotic creatures, but not out of curiosity. Clan Moulder will always pay a good price for new specimens.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skaven collect exotic creatures, but not out of curiosity. Clan Moulder will always pay a good price for new specimens.

short_description.last_approved_text: Once hunted, the creatures are stored in pens and cages for spectators or potential buyers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Once hunted, the creatures are stored in pens and cages for spectators or potential buyers.

short_description.last_approved_text: In such underground markets, factors from Moulder and other interested clans come to barter-trade for specimens.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In such underground markets, factors from Moulder and other interested clans come to barter-trade for specimens.

short_description.last_approved_text: While red rock is not as prized as green rock, it still has its uses as dyes for banners and armour.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: While red rock is not as prized as green rock, it still has its uses as dyes for banners and armour.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skaven dye-plants are arcane-chemical nightmares that spew out toxic waste in an attempt to create… something.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skaven dye-plants are arcane-chemical nightmares that spew out toxic waste in an attempt to create… something.

short_description.last_approved_text: Hidden caves and tunnel alcoves allow access to the overground, where Skaven hunters can stalk their prey.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Hidden caves and tunnel alcoves allow access to the overground, where Skaven hunters can stalk their prey.

short_description.last_approved_text: "If no-furs insist on wearing furs, then Skaven should wear furs too-too!"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "If no-furs insist on wearing furs, then Skaven should wear furs too-too!"

short_description.last_approved_text: Skaven gemcutters practice on what Man-things consider precious stones, for it is Warpstone they really want to slice.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skaven gemcutters practice on what Man-things consider precious stones, for it is Warpstone they really want to slice.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skaven sniff out gold, and will excavate out of spite, knowing Man-things and Dwarf-things crave it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skaven sniff out gold, and will excavate out of spite, knowing Man-things and Dwarf-things crave it.

short_description.last_approved_text: Although they have no use for it themselves, Skaven purposely mine gold purely to inconvenience the other races.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Although they have no use for it themselves, Skaven purposely mine gold purely to inconvenience the other races.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skavenslaves are sent to excavate iron seams - they will labour until exhaustion.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skavenslaves are sent to excavate iron seams - they will labour until exhaustion.

short_description.last_approved_text: Metal-working is known to only a few clans, while others scavenge or barter for forged weapons.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Metal-working is known to only a few clans, while others scavenge or barter for forged weapons.

short_description.last_approved_text: Weird-stone not Warpstone! Smooth and lined, but some warlords like it…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Weird-stone not Warpstone! Smooth and lined, but some warlords like it…

short_description.last_approved_text: Clan Skryre has cutting machines that can slice through stone… and limbs.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Clan Skryre has cutting machines that can slice through stone… and limbs.

short_description.last_approved_text: Some Skaven adepts are skilled at carving; warlords will patronise them in order to sell their services on for their own profit or status.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Some Skaven adepts are skilled at carving; warlords will patronise them in order to sell their services on for their own profit or status.

short_description.last_approved_text: There are few herbs growing underground, so some Skaven scavenge for plants above it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There are few herbs growing underground, so some Skaven scavenge for plants above it.

short_description.last_approved_text: Alchemy has always been an area in which Skaven have excelled, having an innate willingness to experiment combined with little worry for personal risk…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Alchemy has always been an area in which Skaven have excelled, having an innate willingness to experiment combined with little worry for personal risk…

short_description.last_approved_text: Pastures? Underground mud-yards where mewling meat-things are kept ready for slaughter.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Pastures? Underground mud-yards where mewling meat-things are kept ready for slaughter.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skaven factory farms are hellish places where half-formed things are bred to feed the masses.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skaven factory farms are hellish places where half-formed things are bred to feed the masses.

short_description.last_approved_text: Larger factory farms are more then mere underground pastures - they provide food on an industrial scale.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Larger factory farms are more then mere underground pastures - they provide food on an industrial scale.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ratmen pots are far from the aesthetically-pleasing pieces of other races: they are scraggy, untidy mass-produced.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Ratmen pots are far from the aesthetically-pleasing pieces of other races: they are scraggy, untidy mass-produced.

short_description.last_approved_text: Kilns are large Warpfire-powered ovens capable of mass-production.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Kilns are large Warpfire-powered ovens capable of mass-production.

short_description.last_approved_text: Salt is mined. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job - send in the slaves!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Salt is mined. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job - send in the slaves!

short_description.last_approved_text: Clan Eshin has a tunnel network that reaches into the far east, of which they bring powders coveted by the other clans.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Clan Eshin has a tunnel network that reaches into the far east, of which they bring powders coveted by the other clans.

short_description.last_approved_text: Warpstone-enhanced lumber is always needed in the Under-Empire.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Warpstone-enhanced lumber is always needed in the Under-Empire.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wood in its natural form is hard to work with, so the timber mills turn it into lumber ready for sale.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wood in its natural form is hard to work with, so the timber mills turn it into lumber ready for sale.

short_description.last_approved_text: Underground lumber yards, held under by clans and their factors, where goods are exchanged for many Warptokens.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Underground lumber yards, held under by clans and their factors, where goods are exchanged for many Warptokens.

short_description.last_approved_text: Squashing sour fruits creates an intoxicating drink better than Skavenbrew, yes-yes!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Squashing sour fruits creates an intoxicating drink better than Skavenbrew, yes-yes!

short_description.last_approved_text: Factors will store the fruit brew and let it ferment, like the Beard-things do with grains.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Factors will store the fruit brew and let it ferment, like the Beard-things do with grains.

short_description.last_approved_text: Clan factors will then sell the brew far and wide, often lacing it with Warpstone essence for those who can afford the price.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Clan factors will then sell the brew far and wide, often lacing it with Warpstone essence for those who can afford the price.

short_description.last_approved_text: The worst pieces of broken swag scavenged from battlefields above and below, is thrown into the trash hole and fought over by the Skavenslaves.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The worst pieces of broken swag scavenged from battlefields above and below, is thrown into the trash hole and fought over by the Skavenslaves.

short_description.last_approved_text: Scavenge-piles are where the useful accoutrements claimed and stolen by the clans after battle are placed for its champions to scour.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Scavenge-piles are where the useful accoutrements claimed and stolen by the clans after battle are placed for its champions to scour.

short_description.last_approved_text: The scrap heap is made from the most valuable items scavenged from the over-worlds of the Man-things, Elf-things and Beard-things.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The scrap heap is made from the most valuable items scavenged from the over-worlds of the Man-things, Elf-things and Beard-things.

short_description.last_approved_text: Packs of Skaven gather in smaller burrows often used as staging areas where clans make ready to burst forth.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Packs of Skaven gather in smaller burrows often used as staging areas where clans make ready to burst forth.

short_description.last_approved_text: The lairs of the ratmen remain unseen by the other things, but just below the world the Skaven lurk in their hideouts, ready to invade.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The lairs of the ratmen remain unseen by the other things, but just below the world the Skaven lurk in their hideouts, ready to invade.

short_description.last_approved_text: Usually owned by a dominant clan, the nest-lairs are much larger warrens linked by a impenetrable maze of tunnels.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Usually owned by a dominant clan, the nest-lairs are much larger warrens linked by a impenetrable maze of tunnels.

short_description.last_approved_text: The teeming tunnel networks of stronghold-warrens do not just sprawl underground, but can riddle entire mountains and chasm walls as well.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The teeming tunnel networks of stronghold-warrens do not just sprawl underground, but can riddle entire mountains and chasm walls as well.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skaven under-cities rise from the ground like a swollen sore - ruins of other races shamelessly usurped into the erratic architecture.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skaven under-cities rise from the ground like a swollen sore - ruins of other races shamelessly usurped into the erratic architecture.

short_description.last_approved_text: The fetid, shambolic temple is a maze of tunnels that all lead to the Altar of the Great Horned One.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The fetid, shambolic temple is a maze of tunnels that all lead to the Altar of the Great Horned One.

short_description.last_approved_text: Weapon burrows, where combustible Skryre techno-weapons are stored, are not jealously guarded because if incompetently handled the user will quickly perish.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Weapon burrows, where combustible Skryre techno-weapons are stored, are not jealously guarded because if incompetently handled the user will quickly perish.

short_description.last_approved_text: For logistical reasons, Skaven clans have arsenals of their most successful and 'reliable' weaponry, kept secure with arcane locks.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For logistical reasons, Skaven clans have arsenals of their most successful and 'reliable' weaponry, kept secure with arcane locks.

short_description.last_approved_text: The pure, unfiltered darkness oozing from this altar is enough to give even the hardest Druchii pause.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The pure, unfiltered darkness oozing from this altar is enough to give even the hardest Druchii pause.

short_description.last_approved_text: The capital Reiksfort - home of the imperious order of the Reiksguard.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The capital Reiksfort - home of the imperious order of the Reiksguard.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Emperor's palace is the grandest edifice in Altdorf - home to the Altdorf Princes of old.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Emperor's palace is the grandest edifice in Altdorf - home to the Altdorf Princes of old.

short_description.last_approved_text: This Bretonnian outpost in conquered Altdorf has been given over to the ruling duke.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This Bretonnian outpost in conquered Altdorf has been given over to the ruling duke.

short_description.last_approved_text: Palace of the Eternal Emperor, seat of the von Carsteins now and forever.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Palace of the Eternal Emperor, seat of the von Carsteins now and forever.

short_description.last_approved_text: Anaerion himself once sat upon the throne at Tor Anlec, making the city a focal point of Asur defences.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Anaerion himself once sat upon the throne at Tor Anlec, making the city a focal point of Asur defences.

short_description.last_approved_text: In Conalxa's shrine do the Chameleon Skinks give thanks to the Old One who preserves and enhances them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In Conalxa's shrine do the Chameleon Skinks give thanks to the Old One who preserves and enhances them.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ancestral home of the Blood Dragon Order, an honourable martial order until Walach Harkon visited.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Ancestral home of the Blood Dragon Order, an honourable martial order until Walach Harkon visited.

short_description.last_approved_text: Those who visit the Chamber of Visions shall see what the Old Ones see: the many threads of the future.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Those who visit the Chamber of Visions shall see what the Old Ones see: the many threads of the future.

short_description.last_approved_text: Deep below the Tower of Doom, all manner of beasts are kept and … investigated, in the name of greater power.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Deep below the Tower of Doom, all manner of beasts are kept and … investigated, in the name of greater power.

short_description.last_approved_text: Spawning pools defiled by Clan Pestilens; the half-formed creatures that emerge make for easy pickings.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Spawning pools defiled by Clan Pestilens; the half-formed creatures that emerge make for easy pickings.

short_description.last_approved_text: The sea-faring High Elves of Cothique built grand edifices into the cliffsides, creating palatial underground cities.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The sea-faring High Elves of Cothique built grand edifices into the cliffsides, creating palatial underground cities.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Druchii give praise to the God of Smiths, in the hope he will bestow the legendary artefacts upon them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Druchii give praise to the God of Smiths, in the hope he will bestow the legendary artefacts upon them.

short_description.last_approved_text: All the best places are ones you've nicked from other races and then made your own by leaving piles of poo and shiny stuff everywhere.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All the best places are ones you've nicked from other races and then made your own by leaving piles of poo and shiny stuff everywhere.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Court Hall are where the Undead nobles, and living thralls come to play games of courtly intrigue.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Court Hall are where the Undead nobles, and living thralls come to play games of courtly intrigue.

short_description.last_approved_text: While the surface city of Karak Eight Peaks is grand, it is, underneath, in the colonnaded halls, deep underground where the true wealth resides. It is ripe for Clan Mors to take!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: While the surface city of Karak Eight Peaks is grand, it is, underneath, in the colonnaded halls, deep underground where the true wealth resides. It is ripe for Clan Mors to take!

short_description.last_approved_text: The tombs of the revered Dwarf kings of the Eight Peaks are situated even deeper than the vaults. If Clan Mors break the seals of the crypts, it will ensure their entry in the Book of Grudges for all eternity!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The tombs of the revered Dwarf kings of the Eight Peaks are situated even deeper than the vaults. If Clan Mors break the seals of the crypts, it will ensure their entry in the Book of Grudges for all eternity!

short_description.last_approved_text: The greatest riches in all of Vala-Azril-Ungol are kept in the treasury, a massive chamber that once held the wealth of the Dwarfhold and its greatest relics. Its seals were the hardest to prise apart… until now.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The greatest riches in all of Vala-Azril-Ungol are kept in the treasury, a massive chamber that once held the wealth of the Dwarfhold and its greatest relics. Its seals were the hardest to prise apart… until now.

short_description.last_approved_text: The finest steeds for the finest Elves. So it has always been. So it will always be.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The finest steeds for the finest Elves. So it has always been. So it will always be.

short_description.last_approved_text: The court of Avelorn is a great carnival, pitching silken pavilions in which Elves make sport and recite epic poetry.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The court of Avelorn is a great carnival, pitching silken pavilions in which Elves make sport and recite epic poetry.

short_description.last_approved_text: Within the great plateau of this ancient construct is the stellar engine; the secrets of its construction jealously guarded.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Within the great plateau of this ancient construct is the stellar engine; the secrets of its construction jealously guarded.

short_description.last_approved_text: From the safety of a fortified position, warriors fire destructive ordnance upon approaching attackers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From the safety of a fortified position, warriors fire destructive ordnance upon approaching attackers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Mourkain is the ancient Vampire kingdom of Kadon, who once controlled the Badlands. It was superseded by the Strygos Empire, of which ghoul-infested ruins still remain.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Mourkain is the ancient Vampire kingdom of Kadon, who once controlled the Badlands. It was superseded by the Strygos Empire, of which ghoul-infested ruins still remain.

short_description.last_approved_text: Oathgold or 'Galbaraz' is the purest gold, mined from the deepest of deeps. Only small deposits exist, usually in remote locations.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Oathgold or 'Galbaraz' is the purest gold, mined from the deepest of deeps. Only small deposits exist, usually in remote locations.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Dark Cultists studying within say they can see the future. To this end, they study tirelessly and without cease.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Dark Cultists studying within say they can see the future. To this end, they study tirelessly and without cease.

short_description.last_approved_text: The dark tomes that are studied herein, and the vicious incantations practised can shake the very foundations of the world.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The dark tomes that are studied herein, and the vicious incantations practised can shake the very foundations of the world.

short_description.last_approved_text: Let its thousand lamps guide you to safe harbour.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Let its thousand lamps guide you to safe harbour.

short_description.last_approved_text: An ancient tower clad in pure gold, constructed by the Lizardmen at the order of the Old Ones in an age long past.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: An ancient tower clad in pure gold, constructed by the Lizardmen at the order of the Old Ones in an age long past.

short_description.last_approved_text: Far, far below Hag Graef, slaves toil in darkness for their masters' wealth.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Far, far below Hag Graef, slaves toil in darkness for their masters' wealth.

short_description.last_approved_text: The precious minerals, so desired by the Druchii, are prized from the rock by bloodied, blackened hands.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The precious minerals, so desired by the Druchii, are prized from the rock by bloodied, blackened hands.

short_description.last_approved_text: The mines stretch on, seemingly endless, with every shaft and seam another hazardous tunnel of possibility.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The mines stretch on, seemingly endless, with every shaft and seam another hazardous tunnel of possibility.

short_description.last_approved_text: Nowhere in Naggaroth is less safe. One could lose much and more along the treacherous crags.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Nowhere in Naggaroth is less safe. One could lose much and more along the treacherous crags.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gaze upon the majestic beasts of old and realise your place within the world.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gaze upon the majestic beasts of old and realise your place within the world.

short_description.last_approved_text: From within, the Blood Queen unearths new and excruciating methods of murder.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From within, the Blood Queen unearths new and excruciating methods of murder.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Druchii worship the brutality of Khaine above all, founding centres of agony in his name.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Druchii worship the brutality of Khaine above all, founding centres of agony in his name.

short_description.last_approved_text: Down, deep in Hell Pit are where Clan Moulder keep their most promising and... foul specimens.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Down, deep in Hell Pit are where Clan Moulder keep their most promising and... foul specimens.

short_description.last_approved_text: Within the Blessed Incubator, the beasts of Hexoatl are kept, ready for the Old One Itzl to leave his mark.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Within the Blessed Incubator, the beasts of Hexoatl are kept, ready for the Old One Itzl to leave his mark.

short_description.last_approved_text: Upon the southern horizon of Hexoatl, on the eve of the equinox, stellar pyramids will rise above the jungle canopy.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Upon the southern horizon of Hexoatl, on the eve of the equinox, stellar pyramids will rise above the jungle canopy.

short_description.last_approved_text: The shimmering, healing Emerald Pools of Itza are truly a sight to behold; even cold-blooded eyes appreciate their beauty.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The shimmering, healing Emerald Pools of Itza are truly a sight to behold; even cold-blooded eyes appreciate their beauty.

short_description.last_approved_text: Under Itza, the Vaults of the Old Ones contain many secrets of the Ancient Enemy, and, some say, how to finally defeat them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Under Itza, the Vaults of the Old Ones contain many secrets of the Ancient Enemy, and, some say, how to finally defeat them.

short_description.last_approved_text: "This palace is the result of years of back-breaking labour. Somebody else's, of course. Not mine. No, no!"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "This palace is the result of years of back-breaking labour. Somebody else's, of course. Not mine. No, no!"

short_description.last_approved_text: A treacherous path, to be sure, but safety lies beyond to those who can navigate it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A treacherous path, to be sure, but safety lies beyond to those who can navigate it.

short_description.last_approved_text: "Safety, friend. Come ashore; you're in the greatest city in the world, now."

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "Safety, friend. Come ashore; you're in the greatest city in the world, now."

short_description.last_approved_text: These towering gates bar passage to anyone harbouring ill designs about Ulthuan.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: These towering gates bar passage to anyone harbouring ill designs about Ulthuan.

short_description.last_approved_text: The gathering place and centre of power for Clan Mors, where Warlords address their kin-lords.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The gathering place and centre of power for Clan Mors, where Warlords address their kin-lords.

short_description.last_approved_text: The once beatific fortress of Mousillon is now a decrepit pile, but still a formidable stronghold for the living to attack.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The once beatific fortress of Mousillon is now a decrepit pile, but still a formidable stronghold for the living to attack.

short_description.last_approved_text: Leering over the landscape, an ominous sentinel keeping would-be brigands in check.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Leering over the landscape, an ominous sentinel keeping would-be brigands in check.

short_description.last_approved_text: The citadel stands as a deathly warning to any who would oppose Malekith's hegemony over the Druchii.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The citadel stands as a deathly warning to any who would oppose Malekith's hegemony over the Druchii.

short_description.last_approved_text: The creatures that take flight flock to the Shrine of Birds, the Old One whose essence resides within awarding all creatures that take flight.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The creatures that take flight flock to the Shrine of Birds, the Old One whose essence resides within awarding all creatures that take flight.

short_description.last_approved_text: At the court of the Phoenix King many come to petition the Finubar and play their intrigues.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: At the court of the Phoenix King many come to petition the Finubar and play their intrigues.

short_description.last_approved_text: The first of Nagash's great and powerful edifices. Even millennia later it is still surrounded by fell magic.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The first of Nagash's great and powerful edifices. Even millennia later it is still surrounded by fell magic.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is only fitting that the great Black Pyramid is under Undead ownership.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is only fitting that the great Black Pyramid is under Undead ownership.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is in Quetza where Sotek's followers are the most fervent. The ratmen should fear the coldbloods that emerge from these lairs.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is in Quetza where Sotek's followers are the most fervent. The ratmen should fear the coldbloods that emerge from these lairs.

short_description.last_approved_text: The catacombs of this impossibly ancient city conceal treasures that are not of this realm.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The catacombs of this impossibly ancient city conceal treasures that are not of this realm.

short_description.last_approved_text: Quintex has stood since before the dawn of recorded history. Within its vaults lie treasures beyond comprehension.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Quintex has stood since before the dawn of recorded history. Within its vaults lie treasures beyond comprehension.

short_description.last_approved_text: The deepest chancels within Quintex may very well hold treasures and learnings that unlock the past, and foretell the future.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The deepest chancels within Quintex may very well hold treasures and learnings that unlock the past, and foretell the future.

short_description.last_approved_text: The great hangars of Karaz-a-Karak are the home of its infamous Airkorps.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The great hangars of Karaz-a-Karak are the home of its infamous Airkorps.

short_description.last_approved_text: The forest of Laurelorn is home to a thriving enclave of Elves that refused to leave the Old World at the conclusion of the War of the Beard.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The forest of Laurelorn is home to a thriving enclave of Elves that refused to leave the Old World at the conclusion of the War of the Beard.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skavenblight is the noisome capital of the ratmen - a sprawling metropolis and chief lair of the Thirteen Lords of Decay.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skavenblight is the noisome capital of the ratmen - a sprawling metropolis and chief lair of the Thirteen Lords of Decay.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skavenblight, the noisome capital of the ratmen, is the most infamous of all under-cities - a sprawling metropolis and chief lair of the Thirteen Lords of Decay.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skavenblight, the noisome capital of the ratmen, is the most infamous of all under-cities - a sprawling metropolis and chief lair of the Thirteen Lords of Decay.

short_description.last_approved_text: Here the High Elves may give praise to the ruler of the Elven pantheon, Asuryan.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Here the High Elves may give praise to the ruler of the Elven pantheon, Asuryan.

short_description.last_approved_text: What was once a place of worship, reduced now to so much cinder.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: What was once a place of worship, reduced now to so much cinder.

short_description.last_approved_text: Give praise to the Lord of War, and hope he answers with righteous fury.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Give praise to the Lord of War, and hope he answers with righteous fury.

short_description.last_approved_text: What was once a place of worship, reduced now to so much cinder.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: What was once a place of worship, reduced now to so much cinder.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skavenblight is the centre of all Skaven power, where the Lords of Decay meet to decide the fates of all.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skavenblight is the centre of all Skaven power, where the Lords of Decay meet to decide the fates of all.

short_description.last_approved_text: The impossibly high tower reaches from the darkest depths to scrape the sky; at its tip, the Bell of the Horned Rat.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The impossibly high tower reaches from the darkest depths to scrape the sky; at its tip, the Bell of the Horned Rat.

short_description.last_approved_text: At the sunken palace of Tor Anroc the Hall of Charioteers is an eternal legacy for Tiranoc's greatest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: At the sunken palace of Tor Anroc the Hall of Charioteers is an eternal legacy for Tiranoc's greatest.

short_description.last_approved_text: Tiranoc is a hard-forged diamond: a resplendent city of defiance in the face of would-be catastrophe.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Tiranoc is a hard-forged diamond: a resplendent city of defiance in the face of would-be catastrophe.

short_description.last_approved_text: In the City of the Moon sits the Temple of the Eclipse, its power reverberating whenever the two moons align.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In the City of the Moon sits the Temple of the Eclipse, its power reverberating whenever the two moons align.

short_description.last_approved_text: White Lions are proud predators that roam the northern forests, who in turn are hunted by Chrace's warriors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: White Lions are proud predators that roam the northern forests, who in turn are hunted by Chrace's warriors.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Loremasters of the High Elves great take pride in their vast scroll collections.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Loremasters of the High Elves great take pride in their vast scroll collections.

short_description.last_approved_text: Visible from many miles, the White Tower is the greatest sanctuary of knowledge in the known world.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Visible from many miles, the White Tower is the greatest sanctuary of knowledge in the known world.

short_description.last_approved_text: One of the reasons Eight Peaks rivalled Everpeak in greatness was the colonnaded hub of the Underway, in the lower deeps. This was a key crossroads, allowing trade and military access throughout the Karaz Ankor.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: One of the reasons Eight Peaks rivalled Everpeak in greatness was the colonnaded hub of the Underway, in the lower deeps. This was a key crossroads, allowing trade and military access throughout the Karaz Ankor.

short_description.last_approved_text: Beneath the Eight Peaks is a key nexus for all tunnels in the region – a junction that unlocks the World’s Edge Mountains for any ambitious Skaven Warlord. Whichever clan controls this hub can influence the entire Under-Empire.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Beneath the Eight Peaks is a key nexus for all tunnels in the region – a junction that unlocks the World’s Edge Mountains for any ambitious Skaven Warlord. Whichever clan controls this hub can influence the entire Under-Empire.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Underworld Sea is a cavernous ocean under Naggaroth that allows Druchii navies to swiftly travel from coast to coast.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Underworld Sea is a cavernous ocean under Naggaroth that allows Druchii navies to swiftly travel from coast to coast.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Temple of Mists is surrounded by enchanted fog that protects all of Xlanhuapec.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Temple of Mists is surrounded by enchanted fog that protects all of Xlanhuapec.

short_description.last_approved_text: They say of Tor Yvresse that it is easily as grand as any Elven city of old.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: They say of Tor Yvresse that it is easily as grand as any Elven city of old.

short_description.last_approved_text: By dawn's early light… does it call to the bosom of the Old Ones for their protection and illumination.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: By dawn's early light… does it call to the bosom of the Old Ones for their protection and illumination.

short_description.last_approved_text: Some battles are fought over areas drenched in magic. The corpses that litter these sites are ripe for Necromancers…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Some battles are fought over areas drenched in magic. The corpses that litter these sites are ripe for Necromancers…

short_description.last_approved_text: Lairs of the dreaded Undead Terrorgheists are massive caves filled with the bones of their prey.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Lairs of the dreaded Undead Terrorgheists are massive caves filled with the bones of their prey.

short_description.last_approved_text: Restless souls are lured by Necromancers into arcane wells and tethered to others for ever more.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Restless souls are lured by Necromancers into arcane wells and tethered to others for ever more.

short_description.last_approved_text: An unholy font of dark dreams and trapped spirits, used by Undead Lords to bolster their legions.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: An unholy font of dark dreams and trapped spirits, used by Undead Lords to bolster their legions.

short_description.last_approved_text: The tree-lined courts are where kindreds send their princes to increase their status through fine deeds.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The tree-lined courts are where kindreds send their princes to increase their status through fine deeds.

short_description.last_approved_text: The healing magics of the Asrai are among the best in all the mortal realms.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The healing magics of the Asrai are among the best in all the mortal realms.

short_description.last_approved_text: A mound of black soil and knotted roots, upon which fell spells may be cast, rises from the ground.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A mound of black soil and knotted roots, upon which fell spells may be cast, rises from the ground.

short_description.last_approved_text: Darkling councils are gatherings of Bray-Shamans. Such a concentration of arcane bodies is bound to lure forth a Cygor.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Darkling councils are gatherings of Bray-Shamans. Such a concentration of arcane bodies is bound to lure forth a Cygor.

short_description.last_approved_text: Centigors can be found in the grassy plains bordering the deeper forests, where they try to outrun the elements.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Centigors can be found in the grassy plains bordering the deeper forests, where they try to outrun the elements.

short_description.last_approved_text: Centigors are incapable of building their own shelters and so find hollows in which to rest and revel.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Centigors are incapable of building their own shelters and so find hollows in which to rest and revel.

short_description.last_approved_text: The strongest Centigors make their lairs in crude shelters or caves, daring any to challenge them for the superior residence.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The strongest Centigors make their lairs in crude shelters or caves, daring any to challenge them for the superior residence.

short_description.last_approved_text: Warhounds that accompany the Beastmen are kept in crude dens, where they are fed prey - both living and dead.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Warhounds that accompany the Beastmen are kept in crude dens, where they are fed prey - both living and dead.

short_description.last_approved_text: There are places in the blood-grounds were suppurating wounds burst from the ground and poison fumes belch from crags.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There are places in the blood-grounds were suppurating wounds burst from the ground and poison fumes belch from crags.

short_description.last_approved_text: In the deep pits are kept Chaos Spawn, blessed with a multitude of gifts from their Dark Gods.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In the deep pits are kept Chaos Spawn, blessed with a multitude of gifts from their Dark Gods.

short_description.last_approved_text: Some Giants will meander into the forests and make a large cave their home if it's not already inhabited.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Some Giants will meander into the forests and make a large cave their home if it's not already inhabited.

short_description.last_approved_text: A rudimentary shelter furthest from the camp's pyre, little more than an indent in the bony ground.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A rudimentary shelter furthest from the camp's pyre, little more than an indent in the bony ground.

short_description.last_approved_text: A pit hovel is a deeper rut, which, amidst the detritus, is where some Ungors choose to reside.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A pit hovel is a deeper rut, which, amidst the detritus, is where some Ungors choose to reside.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Burrows inhabited by Gors often have stinking and gore-infested hides around their entrances.

short_description.last_approved_text: Pelts are placed on a grim totem, then taken into war by the herd's most fearsome warriors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Pelts are placed on a grim totem, then taken into war by the herd's most fearsome warriors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Beastmen roam far in territory known as the blood-grounds. Anything that wanders there is prey.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The hag trees, which carry countless vile fetishes in their jagged branches, are natural meeting places for warherds.

short_description.last_approved_text: Little more than a great pyre surrounded by gore-soaked tents, rude burrows and makeshift pens.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Little more than a great pyre surrounded by gore-soaked tents, rude burrows and makeshift pens.

short_description.last_approved_text: While not a permanent structure by any means, caves or burrows riddled with hag tree roots can house a brayherd.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: While not a permanent structure by any means, caves or burrows riddled with hag tree roots can house a brayherd.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Within the deepest cavern systems, the most ancient of tangled beast-paths forests of herdstones and pyres.

short_description.last_approved_text: Minotaurs crave man-flesh the most. At the fire pits, manling meat sizzles on crude spits, drawing the tribes.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Minotaurs crave man-flesh the most. At the fire pits, manling meat sizzles on crude spits, drawing the tribes.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To let the raging pyre lessen or extinguish is to proffer insults to the Dark Gods.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Old World contains many altars to its myriad gods. When the Beastmen come, these sacred places will be despoiled.
