building_short_description_texts.short_description: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

short_description.last_approved_text: The infamous and renowned Dwarf beers are left to mature until needed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The infamous and renowned Dwarf beers are left to mature until needed.

short_description.last_approved_text: More important than the gates that secure it, than the barracks that houses the soldiers, is a Dwarfhold’s brewery.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: More important than the gates that secure it, than the barracks that houses the soldiers, is a Dwarfhold’s brewery.

short_description.last_approved_text: A Dwarfhold with a famed brewery attached is one worth defending at all costs, its casks as valuable as gold.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A Dwarfhold with a famed brewery attached is one worth defending at all costs, its casks as valuable as gold.

short_description.last_approved_text: In locked chambers beyond the Hold's brewery, are the brewmaster's kettles. These are where the special and secret ales are brewed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In locked chambers beyond the Hold's brewery, are the brewmaster's kettles. These are where the special and secret ales are brewed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Cinnabar, also known as blood rock, is a mineral which contains mercury, prized by alchemists and dye-makers alike.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Cinnabar, also known as blood rock, is a mineral which contains mercury, prized by alchemists and dye-makers alike.

short_description.last_approved_text: Blood rock mines are larger excavation sites, made when substantial cinnabar deposits are discovered.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Blood rock mines are larger excavation sites, made when substantial cinnabar deposits are discovered.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarf dye-makers are rare but not unknown, usually having a fortified plant further away from the main Hold.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarf dye-makers are rare but not unknown, usually having a fortified plant further away from the main Hold.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Dyers' Guild is relatively small, but accrues wealth as it seeks new customers from the empires of men.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Dyers' Guild is relatively small, but accrues wealth as it seeks new customers from the empires of men.

short_description.last_approved_text: Lodges, where hunters gather and store their prey, are located deep within the forested hunting grounds.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Lodges, where hunters gather and store their prey, are located deep within the forested hunting grounds.

short_description.last_approved_text: Camps are where Dwarf hunters assemble before their work begins.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Camps are where Dwarf hunters assemble before their work begins.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is not just the meat that is used, animal skins and furs certainly have value also.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is not just the meat that is used, animal skins and furs certainly have value also.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Leatherworkers' Guild is mainly found in the Holds around the Vaults and Grey Mountains, where plenty of manling customers can be found.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Leatherworkers' Guild is mainly found in the Holds around the Vaults and Grey Mountains, where plenty of manling customers can be found.

short_description.last_approved_text: A gem mineshaft is for digging into the mountains in search of precious stones, something Dwarfs are very good at.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A gem mineshaft is for digging into the mountains in search of precious stones, something Dwarfs are very good at.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gem mines are valuable resources, especially if they have a high yield.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gem mines are valuable resources, especially if they have a high yield.

short_description.last_approved_text: Members of the Gemcutters' Guild are respected both for their craft and for the riches they create.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Members of the Gemcutters' Guild are respected both for their craft and for the riches they create.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Gemcutters' Guild is rich, by the very nature of the commodity in which it deals.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Gemcutters' Guild is rich, by the very nature of the commodity in which it deals.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gold has ever been lusted after by men and Dwarfs. Small mines dot the Old World, their owners hoping to strike big.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gold has ever been lusted after by men and Dwarfs. Small mines dot the Old World, their owners hoping to strike big.

short_description.last_approved_text: On discovering a substantial seam of gold, a small mine needs fortifying against other treasure-seekers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: On discovering a substantial seam of gold, a small mine needs fortifying against other treasure-seekers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Once extracted from the mountains, gold is smelted into bars or even minted into coins.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Once extracted from the mountains, gold is smelted into bars or even minted into coins.

short_description.last_approved_text: While the Goldsmiths' Guild cannot match other Guilds' influence, they are certainly the wealthiest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: While the Goldsmiths' Guild cannot match other Guilds' influence, they are certainly the wealthiest.

short_description.last_approved_text: Iron ore is a necessity in a world that constantly demands new weapons and armour.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Iron ore is a necessity in a world that constantly demands new weapons and armour.

short_description.last_approved_text: Iron mines are the most common underground works of both man and Dwarf.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Iron mines are the most common underground works of both man and Dwarf.

short_description.last_approved_text: Iron smelters processes the raw iron ore so it can then be turned into steel.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Iron smelters processes the raw iron ore so it can then be turned into steel.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Miners' Guild has close ties to similar professions. Together they are the most powerful Guilders-bloc in the Karaz Ankor.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Miners' Guild has close ties to similar professions. Together they are the most powerful Guilders-bloc in the Karaz Ankor.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfs know the secret of creating, not only Gromril, but puresteel also.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarfs know the secret of creating, not only Gromril, but puresteel also.

short_description.last_approved_text: A stonecutter fashions large hunks of stone, for ease of transport and construction.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A stonecutter fashions large hunks of stone, for ease of transport and construction.

short_description.last_approved_text: Large marble deposits are quarried for use in opulent residences and grand halls.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Large marble deposits are quarried for use in opulent residences and grand halls.

short_description.last_approved_text: A mason is more than a mere stone cutter, he is able to fashion grand shapes from his chosen material.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A mason is more than a mere stone cutter, he is able to fashion grand shapes from his chosen material.

short_description.last_approved_text: For thousands of years, the Masons' Guild has made the Karaks the envy of the world.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For thousands of years, the Masons' Guild has made the Karaks the envy of the world.

short_description.last_approved_text: Goats are a favoured animal for rearing. This is in no small part because Dwarfs and goats share the mountainsides.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Goats are a favoured animal for rearing. This is in no small part because Dwarfs and goats share the mountainsides.

short_description.last_approved_text: Goat. It’s a tough, stringy meat, but then Dwarfs are tough too, and like their food to have the same qualities!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Goat. It’s a tough, stringy meat, but then Dwarfs are tough too, and like their food to have the same qualities!

short_description.last_approved_text: Goat farms comprise several herds kept in barns or other housings, perhaps even within the Hold.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Goat farms comprise several herds kept in barns or other housings, perhaps even within the Hold.

short_description.last_approved_text: For all Dwarfs who work above ground, this is the Guild they turn to.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For all Dwarfs who work above ground, this is the Guild they turn to.

short_description.last_approved_text: Solidified salt is mined from brine wells. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job, perfect for the underclasses.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Solidified salt is mined from brine wells. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job, perfect for the underclasses.

short_description.last_approved_text: Larger brine deposits need more intensive mining from pits which delve ever deeper into the ground.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Larger brine deposits need more intensive mining from pits which delve ever deeper into the ground.

short_description.last_approved_text: Saltworks are where brine is broken down and salt is extracted from saltwater.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Saltworks are where brine is broken down and salt is extracted from saltwater.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Saltworkers' Guild lacks influence but has very close ties to the Empire, its major export partner.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Saltworkers' Guild lacks influence but has very close ties to the Empire, its major export partner.

short_description.last_approved_text: Here, saltpeter is mixed with black powder to improve its potency.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Here, saltpeter is mixed with black powder to improve its potency.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfen carpentry exceeds that of Empire craftsmen, but wood is far scarcer in the mountains.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarfen carpentry exceeds that of Empire craftsmen, but wood is far scarcer in the mountains.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wood in its natural form is hard to work with, so the timber mills turn it into lumber ready for sale.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wood in its natural form is hard to work with, so the timber mills turn it into lumber ready for sale.

short_description.last_approved_text: Lumberyards are wholesale markets where wood is stored in great quantities before being shipped to its final customer.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Lumberyards are wholesale markets where wood is stored in great quantities before being shipped to its final customer.

short_description.last_approved_text: Unusually, the Carpenters' Guild hall is lined with wainscoting and populated with grandiose benches of the finest timber.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Unusually, the Carpenters' Guild hall is lined with wainscoting and populated with grandiose benches of the finest timber.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfs do occasionally live above the ground - there are outposts scattered throughout the World's Edge Mountains and beyond.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarfs do occasionally live above the ground - there are outposts scattered throughout the World's Edge Mountains and beyond.

short_description.last_approved_text: More enterprising Dwarfs seek their own fortune and join colonies away from the greater Holds.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: More enterprising Dwarfs seek their own fortune and join colonies away from the greater Holds.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarf Keeps are the bastions of the realm, impregnable forts built upon and within the mountain peaks.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarf Keeps are the bastions of the realm, impregnable forts built upon and within the mountain peaks.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarf fortress-cities - the Karaks - are truly a site to behold. Each an independent kingdom, together they form the "Karaz Ankor".

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Dwarf fortress-cities - the Karaks - are truly a site to behold. Each an independent kingdom, together they form the "Karaz Ankor".

short_description.last_approved_text: The greatest Dwarfholds are the most legendary; the mightiest strongholds, led by greatest kings of the age.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The greatest Dwarfholds are the most legendary; the mightiest strongholds, led by greatest kings of the age.

short_description.last_approved_text: Members of the Slayer Cult worship at the nearest shrine, when not seeking death.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Members of the Slayer Cult worship at the nearest shrine, when not seeking death.

short_description.last_approved_text: Larger Holds have greater shrines dedicated to the Ancestor Gods; Grimnir is the warrior god and patron of Slayers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Larger Holds have greater shrines dedicated to the Ancestor Gods; Grimnir is the warrior god and patron of Slayers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Hold armies carry countless Dwarfen weapons, from ancient heirlooms to axes fresh from the forge.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Hold armies carry countless Dwarfen weapons, from ancient heirlooms to axes fresh from the forge.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gromril is the rarest of ores; no ordinary forge can get anywhere near hot enough to unlock its secrets.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gromril is the rarest of ores; no ordinary forge can get anywhere near hot enough to unlock its secrets.

short_description.last_approved_text: Only in forges blessed by Valaya, with anvils etched in protective wards, will a Runesmith ply his craft.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Only in forges blessed by Valaya, with anvils etched in protective wards, will a Runesmith ply his craft.

short_description.last_approved_text: Refectories are usually found in the lower deeps, to ensure no warrior is far from ale.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Refectories are usually found in the lower deeps, to ensure no warrior is far from ale.

short_description.last_approved_text: The favourite Dwarf pastime is drinking. "Gorog" is Khazalid for binge-drinking, which happens all the time!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The favourite Dwarf pastime is drinking. "Gorog" is Khazalid for binge-drinking, which happens all the time!

short_description.last_approved_text: When food is on the table as well as ale, Dwarfs retire to the feast hall to fill both their bellies and their bladders.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When food is on the table as well as ale, Dwarfs retire to the feast hall to fill both their bellies and their bladders.

short_description.last_approved_text: Trade depots are effectively inland, underground ports, where merchant caravans from all over the Karaz Ankor offload their wares.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Trade depots are effectively inland, underground ports, where merchant caravans from all over the Karaz Ankor offload their wares.

short_description.last_approved_text: Usually close to the trade depot, the Guild marketplace is a bazaar of grumpy, haggling, Guild factors selling their wares and services.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Usually close to the trade depot, the Guild marketplace is a bazaar of grumpy, haggling, Guild factors selling their wares and services.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarf gates are strong and sound, made from Dwarfen iron and put in place by Dwarfen hands.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarf gates are strong and sound, made from Dwarfen iron and put in place by Dwarfen hands.

short_description.last_approved_text: The gates of the greatest Kazads are banded in foot-thick steel, and guarded by the bearded sentinels of the ancestors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The gates of the greatest Kazads are banded in foot-thick steel, and guarded by the bearded sentinels of the ancestors.

short_description.last_approved_text: The strongest fortress gates are protected by more than just steel and stone.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The strongest fortress gates are protected by more than just steel and stone.

short_description.last_approved_text: As well as fashioning stone, the Dwarfs are also expert carpenters, as the workers in the siege workshops will attest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: As well as fashioning stone, the Dwarfs are also expert carpenters, as the workers in the siege workshops will attest.

short_description.last_approved_text: The secret of black powder, formulated here, is one shared only between the Empire and Dwarfs.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The secret of black powder, formulated here, is one shared only between the Empire and Dwarfs.

short_description.last_approved_text: The lower deeps of the Dwarfholds glow from the many war machines created in their foundries.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The lower deeps of the Dwarfholds glow from the many war machines created in their foundries.

short_description.last_approved_text: Hangars, high among the mountain tops, from which Dwarfen air fleets launch.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Hangars, high among the mountain tops, from which Dwarfen air fleets launch.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is on the training field that soldiers first learn the most important of attributes, that of discipline.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is on the training field that soldiers first learn the most important of attributes, that of discipline.

short_description.last_approved_text: On hearing the call to muster, it is to the rally field the regiments will gather.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: On hearing the call to muster, it is to the rally field the regiments will gather.

short_description.last_approved_text: Barracks are, by necessity, large billet houses for accommodating State Troops.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Barracks are, by necessity, large billet houses for accommodating State Troops.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Old World has many mouths to feed; grain provides the grist for mills and the base ingredient for spirits.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Old World has many mouths to feed; grain provides the grist for mills and the base ingredient for spirits.

short_description.last_approved_text: Farms large and small cross the Old World – growing crops, especially grains, for the crowded towns and cities.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Farms large and small cross the Old World – growing crops, especially grains, for the crowded towns and cities.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wherever the forest breaks, large swathes of land are given over to agriculture, most of which is owned by nobles.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wherever the forest breaks, large swathes of land are given over to agriculture, most of which is owned by nobles.

short_description.last_approved_text: One who is well-versed in the secrets of shaping ores into gun and artillery barrels. It is a skill set in much demand.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: One who is well-versed in the secrets of shaping ores into gun and artillery barrels. It is a skill set in much demand.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Empire’s war needs cannot be matched by a single forge, so large foundries are built to keep up with demand.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Empire’s war needs cannot be matched by a single forge, so large foundries are built to keep up with demand.

short_description.last_approved_text: Master Engineers are eccentrics, their workshops home to crazy inventions and devastating weapons.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Master Engineers are eccentrics, their workshops home to crazy inventions and devastating weapons.

short_description.last_approved_text: Often attached to the walls they protect, the guard house offers shelter and perhaps a hot drink for those on patrol.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Often attached to the walls they protect, the guard house offers shelter and perhaps a hot drink for those on patrol.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Watch is an organised constabulary; not always honest, but still a capable defensive force should the need arise!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Watch is an organised constabulary; not always honest, but still a capable defensive force should the need arise!

short_description.last_approved_text: Garrisons are occupied by state troops; dedicated soldiers placed to defend the settlement by the Elector Count.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Garrisons are occupied by state troops; dedicated soldiers placed to defend the settlement by the Elector Count.

short_description.last_approved_text: The deft creation of cloth is one of man's specialities. Their flamboyant clothing couldn’t exist without weavers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The deft creation of cloth is one of man's specialities. Their flamboyant clothing couldn’t exist without weavers.

short_description.last_approved_text: The clothier turns the bolts of cloth from mere linen to garments – anything from shirts to large, frilly pantaloons!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The clothier turns the bolts of cloth from mere linen to garments – anything from shirts to large, frilly pantaloons!

short_description.last_approved_text: For some, fashion is as important as a sharp blade to have upon your person. Tailors offer such bespoke stylings.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For some, fashion is as important as a sharp blade to have upon your person. Tailors offer such bespoke stylings.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

short_description.last_approved_text: Whether man-made or natural, a harbour is a place for vessels to wait out Stromfel's rage.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Whether man-made or natural, a harbour is a place for vessels to wait out Stromfel's rage.

short_description.last_approved_text: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

short_description.last_approved_text: Cinnabar, also known as blood rock, is a mineral which contains mercury, prized by alchemists and dye-makers alike.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Cinnabar, also known as blood rock, is a mineral which contains mercury, prized by alchemists and dye-makers alike.

short_description.last_approved_text: Blood rock mines are larger excavation sites for when substantial cinnabar deposits are discovered.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Blood rock mines are larger excavation sites for when substantial cinnabar deposits are discovered.

short_description.last_approved_text: Usually situated in the same noxious district as the tanners, a dye-maker’s plant also spills out fumes.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Usually situated in the same noxious district as the tanners, a dye-maker’s plant also spills out fumes.

short_description.last_approved_text: Empire Huntsmen are known for their skill with a bow. Camps are where they launch their forays into the forest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Empire Huntsmen are known for their skill with a bow. Camps are where they launch their forays into the forest.

short_description.last_approved_text: Lodges are located deep within the forested hunting grounds, where hunters gather and store their prey.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Lodges are located deep within the forested hunting grounds, where hunters gather and store their prey.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is not just meat that has its uses, skins and furs do too - at the tannery.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is not just meat that has its uses, skins and furs do too - at the tannery.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gold has ever been lusted after by both men and Dwarfs. Small mines dot the Old World, their owners hoping to strike big.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gold has ever been lusted after by both men and Dwarfs. Small mines dot the Old World, their owners hoping to strike big.

short_description.last_approved_text: On discovering a substantial seam of gold, a small mine gets larger and needs fortifying against other treasure-seekers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: On discovering a substantial seam of gold, a small mine gets larger and needs fortifying against other treasure-seekers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Once recovered from the mountains, gold is smelted into bars or minted into coins of the realm.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Once recovered from the mountains, gold is smelted into bars or minted into coins of the realm.

short_description.last_approved_text: Iron ore is a necessity in a world that craves weapons and armour. Smaller mines usually comprise a single shaft.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Iron ore is a necessity in a world that craves weapons and armour. Smaller mines usually comprise a single shaft.

short_description.last_approved_text: Iron mines are the most common underground works of both men and Dwarfs.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Iron mines are the most common underground works of both men and Dwarfs.

short_description.last_approved_text: Iron smelters process the raw iron ore, so it can be turned into steel or fashioned by smiths.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Iron smelters process the raw iron ore, so it can be turned into steel or fashioned by smiths.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Old World has very few master swordsmiths, for they are the finest craftsmen in the realm and always in demand.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Old World has very few master swordsmiths, for they are the finest craftsmen in the realm and always in demand.

short_description.last_approved_text: Marble is used in opulent residences and grand halls. Where large deposits are discovered, a quarry is constructed to get at it!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Marble is used in opulent residences and grand halls. Where large deposits are discovered, a quarry is constructed to get at it!

short_description.last_approved_text: A stone cutter fashions large hunks of stone, for ease of transport and in preparation for construction.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A stone cutter fashions large hunks of stone, for ease of transport and in preparation for construction.

short_description.last_approved_text: A mason is more than a mere stone cutter, he adds craft to the role and is able to form grand shapes from his chosen material.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A mason is more than a mere stone cutter, he adds craft to the role and is able to form grand shapes from his chosen material.

short_description.last_approved_text: There are farms that are little more than tiny, muddy fields, on which graze scrawny goats or cattle with shrivelled udders.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There are farms that are little more than tiny, muddy fields, on which graze scrawny goats or cattle with shrivelled udders.

short_description.last_approved_text: Larger cattle farms have more land and better, more permanent, housing for the animals they keep.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Larger cattle farms have more land and better, more permanent, housing for the animals they keep.

short_description.last_approved_text: Milk and beef from cows, mutton, pork, and goat are all valuable commodities in a hungry nation.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Milk and beef from cows, mutton, pork, and goat are all valuable commodities in a hungry nation.

short_description.last_approved_text: Warhorse breeders excel at sourcing the bravest and finest destriers for stud.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Warhorse breeders excel at sourcing the bravest and finest destriers for stud.

short_description.last_approved_text: Unsurprisingly, clay pits hold vast amounts of clay, a malleable material that hardens when baked.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Unsurprisingly, clay pits hold vast amounts of clay, a malleable material that hardens when baked.

short_description.last_approved_text: A potter is a craftsman who fashions clay into pottery and other ceramics, from fine crockery to the most basic of bowls.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A potter is a craftsman who fashions clay into pottery and other ceramics, from fine crockery to the most basic of bowls.

short_description.last_approved_text: Kilns are large ovens mostly used by local potters, who bring their merchandise to be baked prior to sale.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Kilns are large ovens mostly used by local potters, who bring their merchandise to be baked prior to sale.

short_description.last_approved_text: Brine wells are where solidified salt is mined. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job, but perfect for the underclasses.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Brine wells are where solidified salt is mined. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job, but perfect for the underclasses.

short_description.last_approved_text: Larger brine deposits need more intensive mining, so more pits delving ever deeper into the ground.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Larger brine deposits need more intensive mining, so more pits delving ever deeper into the ground.

short_description.last_approved_text: These facilities are used for breaking down and grinding brine, as well as extracting salt from bodies of saltwater.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: These facilities are used for breaking down and grinding brine, as well as extracting salt from bodies of saltwater.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wood is an ever-needed resource, and yet the forests of the Old World are not safe places to harvest it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wood is an ever-needed resource, and yet the forests of the Old World are not safe places to harvest it.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wood in its natural form is hard to work with, so the timber mills turn it into lumber ready for sale.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wood in its natural form is hard to work with, so the timber mills turn it into lumber ready for sale.

short_description.last_approved_text: Lumber yards are wholesale markets where wood is stored in great quantities before being shipped to its final customer.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Lumber yards are wholesale markets where wood is stored in great quantities before being shipped to its final customer.

short_description.last_approved_text: Woodworkers, while not as skilled as carpenters, are as fundamental to the realms of men as builders and blacksmiths.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Woodworkers, while not as skilled as carpenters, are as fundamental to the realms of men as builders and blacksmiths.

short_description.last_approved_text: Smaller vineyards can be nothing more than a farm with a few rows of grapes, with a yield hardly worth taxing.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Smaller vineyards can be nothing more than a farm with a few rows of grapes, with a yield hardly worth taxing.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Empire’s southern provinces have a modest wine industry, but nothing compared to Bretonnia's vineyards.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Empire’s southern provinces have a modest wine industry, but nothing compared to Bretonnia's vineyards.

short_description.last_approved_text: The great winemakers hail from Bretonnia, although the states of Tilea and the southern Empire have a few as well.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The great winemakers hail from Bretonnia, although the states of Tilea and the southern Empire have a few as well.

short_description.last_approved_text: Proper roads facilitate trade and encourage travel. Bandits tend to be put off, lest they meet the Emperor's agents along the way.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Proper roads facilitate trade and encourage travel. Bandits tend to be put off, lest they meet the Emperor's agents along the way.

short_description.last_approved_text: Public works must be paid for; invariably, it is the ordinary man who foots the bill.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Public works must be paid for; invariably, it is the ordinary man who foots the bill.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Empire is riddled with homesteads, farms and tiny groups of sullen houses filled with sullen folk.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Empire is riddled with homesteads, farms and tiny groups of sullen houses filled with sullen folk.

short_description.last_approved_text: Villages dot the Empire, usually comprising a marktplaz, a tavern, and a stockade – if their denizens are lucky.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Villages dot the Empire, usually comprising a marktplaz, a tavern, and a stockade – if their denizens are lucky.

short_description.last_approved_text: The towns of the Empire are walled islands of civilisation amidst the unrelenting and hostile wilderness.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The towns of the Empire are walled islands of civilisation amidst the unrelenting and hostile wilderness.

short_description.last_approved_text: Cities are massive places, crammed with ramshackle buildings – all teeming with the stench of mankind.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Cities are massive places, crammed with ramshackle buildings – all teeming with the stench of mankind.

short_description.last_approved_text: The greatest cities of the Empire are self-governing capitals, more powerful than the provinces they sit within.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The greatest cities of the Empire are self-governing capitals, more powerful than the provinces they sit within.

short_description.last_approved_text: Many places have a local smith – skilled at shaping metal but usually good at cracking troublesome skulls with his hammer as well!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Many places have a local smith – skilled at shaping metal but usually good at cracking troublesome skulls with his hammer as well!

short_description.last_approved_text: Armouries are massive storehouses brimming with weapons of war to outfit the regiments of state troops.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Armouries are massive storehouses brimming with weapons of war to outfit the regiments of state troops.

short_description.last_approved_text: Stabling yards are where the young nobles train with their steeds, leaning to shoot from the saddle.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Stabling yards are where the young nobles train with their steeds, leaning to shoot from the saddle.

short_description.last_approved_text: Liveries are more than mere stables – they are where the proud warhorses of the Empire’s Knights are kept.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Liveries are more than mere stables – they are where the proud warhorses of the Empire’s Knights are kept.

short_description.last_approved_text: A place to hold the many dangerous and exotic beasts that would otherwise dwell in the wilderness.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A place to hold the many dangerous and exotic beasts that would otherwise dwell in the wilderness.

short_description.last_approved_text: Smaller taverns are often little more than rooms with kegs of ale stacked along one side of a hay-strewn floor.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Smaller taverns are often little more than rooms with kegs of ale stacked along one side of a hay-strewn floor.

short_description.last_approved_text: Man’s villages and towns across the Old World are dominated by taverns as much as any smithy or general store.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Man’s villages and towns across the Old World are dominated by taverns as much as any smithy or general store.

short_description.last_approved_text: Coaching Inns are large establishments with rooms and stables, found on busy trade routes or in large town centres.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Coaching Inns are large establishments with rooms and stables, found on busy trade routes or in large town centres.

short_description.last_approved_text: Up-righting wooden shafts to create a stockade or a low stone wall may hinder the enemy, but will not keep them out.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Up-righting wooden shafts to create a stockade or a low stone wall may hinder the enemy, but will not keep them out.

short_description.last_approved_text: Cities are usually ringed by high walls of stone to defend against threats within and without the nation’s borders.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Cities are usually ringed by high walls of stone to defend against threats within and without the nation’s borders.

short_description.last_approved_text: The largest of settlements will have great walls, many feet thick, and reinforced with pillars of stone.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The largest of settlements will have great walls, many feet thick, and reinforced with pillars of stone.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wizards are wanderers and often loners by nature but, should one or two of them meet, a conclave is formed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wizards are wanderers and often loners by nature but, should one or two of them meet, a conclave is formed.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Colleges of Magic are located in Altdorf, although the Orders have campuses in cities across the Empire.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Colleges of Magic are located in Altdorf, although the Orders have campuses in cities across the Empire.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wizard come in all sizes and shapes. Funnily enough, so do their dwellings.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wizard come in all sizes and shapes. Funnily enough, so do their dwellings.

short_description.last_approved_text: Sigmarite Shrines vary from roadside memorials to more substantial chapels that hold a small congregation.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Sigmarite Shrines vary from roadside memorials to more substantial chapels that hold a small congregation.

short_description.last_approved_text: Temples of the Sigmarite Cult are bedecked in holy comets; they are altars to the Warrior-God – founder of the Empire!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Temples of the Sigmarite Cult are bedecked in holy comets; they are altars to the Warrior-God – founder of the Empire!

short_description.last_approved_text: The grandest structures of the Sigmarite Cult are the cathedrals dedicated to Sigmar’s worship.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The grandest structures of the Sigmarite Cult are the cathedrals dedicated to Sigmar’s worship.

short_description.last_approved_text: The stinking, stubborn war boars are kept in sties, where visitors smell them long before they see them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The stinking, stubborn war boars are kept in sties, where visitors smell them long before they see them.

short_description.last_approved_text: When does a sty become a farm? When there are lots of boars there.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When does a sty become a farm? When there are lots of boars there.

short_description.last_approved_text: Goblin Big Bosses have a big tent, bigga than the lads’ tents with more skulls on it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Goblin Big Bosses have a big tent, bigga than the lads’ tents with more skulls on it.

short_description.last_approved_text: A status symbol, a show of the Boss’ rising power and a place he can "ang me boots".

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A status symbol, a show of the Boss’ rising power and a place he can "ang me boots".

short_description.last_approved_text: A Boss with his own camp to keep his boyz close is to be feared.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A Boss with his own camp to keep his boyz close is to be feared.

short_description.last_approved_text: This city lies in ruins. Nothing remains but destruction, ashes and the sorrowful taste of defeat.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This city lies in ruins. Nothing remains but destruction, ashes and the sorrowful taste of defeat.

short_description.last_approved_text: Another ruined Karak now lies dormant, a vestige of some upstart's attempt to dominate Dwarf lands.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Another ruined Karak now lies dormant, a vestige of some upstart's attempt to dominate Dwarf lands.

short_description.last_approved_text: Another ruined Karak now lies dormant, a vestige of some upstart's attempt to dominate Dwarf lands.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Another ruined Karak now lies dormant, a vestige of some upstart's attempt to dominate Dwarf lands.

short_description.last_approved_text: Greenskins love their gods, so will quickly carve effigies of Gork and Mork out of stone or other materials when they settle.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Greenskins love their gods, so will quickly carve effigies of Gork and Mork out of stone or other materials when they settle.

short_description.last_approved_text: A totem pole rises above the shacks and tents of the Greenskin settlement as a sign of its success.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A totem pole rises above the shacks and tents of the Greenskin settlement as a sign of its success.

short_description.last_approved_text: A boss pole is a material reminder of how powerful a Warboss has become. It's a mark of great power.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A boss pole is a material reminder of how powerful a Warboss has become. It's a mark of great power.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wolves are rarely penned in, for to keep such creatures against their will is a mistake.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wolves are rarely penned in, for to keep such creatures against their will is a mistake.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is in the gloomiest, dankest parts of the forest where the Spiders make their nests and lay their eggs.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is in the gloomiest, dankest parts of the forest where the Spiders make their nests and lay their eggs.

short_description.last_approved_text: Deep in the forests, the children of the many-eyed and many-legged "Feasters from Beyond" lurk.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Deep in the forests, the children of the many-eyed and many-legged "Feasters from Beyond" lurk.

short_description.last_approved_text: Goblins have keener sight than Orcs, so the "scrawny gits" generally man the watch towers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Goblins have keener sight than Orcs, so the "scrawny gits" generally man the watch towers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Orcs that get guard duty are not the Boss’ chosen boyz, they probably skulked at the back during a charge.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Orcs that get guard duty are not the Boss’ chosen boyz, they probably skulked at the back during a charge.

short_description.last_approved_text: When something is guarded by a garrison of Big ‘Uns it must be important.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When something is guarded by a garrison of Big ‘Uns it must be important.

short_description.last_approved_text: A pile of shiny stuff is what the Greenskins have collected from raidin'.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A pile of shiny stuff is what the Greenskins have collected from raidin'.

short_description.last_approved_text: A heap of shiny stuff is like a pile but bigga!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A heap of shiny stuff is like a pile but bigga!

short_description.last_approved_text: A hoard is not just a heap but multiple piles of shiny fings!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A hoard is not just a heap but multiple piles of shiny fings!

short_description.last_approved_text: The boyz need big open spaces to swing their choppas about.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The boyz need big open spaces to swing their choppas about.

short_description.last_approved_text: A large area set aside for the belligerent gits to slap each other about.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A large area set aside for the belligerent gits to slap each other about.

short_description.last_approved_text: This is where Big ‘Uns are forged and many teef lost to gambling.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This is where Big ‘Uns are forged and many teef lost to gambling.

short_description.last_approved_text: The meanest and strongest of their kind, the Black Orcs rarely mix with others, preferring their own barracks.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The meanest and strongest of their kind, the Black Orcs rarely mix with others, preferring their own barracks.

short_description.last_approved_text: Trolls can be found in their foetid lairs - dank caves or burrows, ankle deep in rotting bones.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Trolls can be found in their foetid lairs - dank caves or burrows, ankle deep in rotting bones.

short_description.last_approved_text: Giants, descendants of the Sky-Titans, are more likely to be found in the stompin' groundz than anywhere else.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Giants, descendants of the Sky-Titans, are more likely to be found in the stompin' groundz than anywhere else.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

short_description.last_approved_text: Whether man-made or natural, a harbour is a place for vessels to wait out Stromfel's rage.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Whether man-made or natural, a harbour is a place for vessels to wait out Stromfel's rage.

short_description.last_approved_text: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

short_description.last_approved_text: In dis cave, da boyz often discover shiny rocks that may well be worth a few teef for da Boss!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In dis cave, da boyz often discover shiny rocks that may well be worth a few teef for da Boss!

short_description.last_approved_text: Some pits are for throwing useless gobbos down, others have gold and other shiny stuff in them. Send in the sniffer squigs and claim it!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Some pits are for throwing useless gobbos down, others have gold and other shiny stuff in them. Send in the sniffer squigs and claim it!

short_description.last_approved_text: Taking mines from da stunties gets their beards in a real twist, especially when da boyz nick all da shiny rocks in ‘em as well.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Taking mines from da stunties gets their beards in a real twist, especially when da boyz nick all da shiny rocks in ‘em as well.

short_description.last_approved_text: Da Black Orcs don't mix with da other gits and prefer ta 'ave dere own fire ta throw stuff into.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Da Black Orcs don't mix with da other gits and prefer ta 'ave dere own fire ta throw stuff into.

short_description.last_approved_text: All Orcs like to "'ave a go" at something big, hoping to claim not only its teef, but the hide too.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All Orcs like to "'ave a go" at something big, hoping to claim not only its teef, but the hide too.

short_description.last_approved_text: Goblins, being consummate tinkerers, have figured out that a great big saw is a way to cut up wood… "and yer mates!"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Goblins, being consummate tinkerers, have figured out that a great big saw is a way to cut up wood… "and yer mates!"

short_description.last_approved_text: Smaller Greenskin tribes and gatherings rarely stay put, although they will seek out caves when they wish to keep "outta da way".

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Smaller Greenskin tribes and gatherings rarely stay put, although they will seek out caves when they wish to keep "outta da way".

short_description.last_approved_text: Orc and Goblin tribes are, in the main, nomadic, but will set up a large camp when the Boss wants to stop for a bit.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Orc and Goblin tribes are, in the main, nomadic, but will set up a large camp when the Boss wants to stop for a bit.

short_description.last_approved_text: When the crap-pile gets too big and the horde of shiny stuff too large to shovel on a cart, it’s "time ta stop moving".

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When the crap-pile gets too big and the horde of shiny stuff too large to shovel on a cart, it’s "time ta stop moving".

short_description.last_approved_text: Greenskins like a good fort, it makes them feel important when they can shout and fling excrement from the walls.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Greenskins like a good fort, it makes them feel important when they can shout and fling excrement from the walls.

short_description.last_approved_text: The biggest and bestest Warbosses rule from formidable strongholds - the shattered Karaks of the Dwarfs.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The biggest and bestest Warbosses rule from formidable strongholds - the shattered Karaks of the Dwarfs.

short_description.last_approved_text: Shamans live apart from their green-skinned kin.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Shamans live apart from their green-skinned kin.

short_description.last_approved_text: Night Goblin Shamans tend to reside in hovels - mouldy lairs deep underground and surrounded by fungal patches.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Night Goblin Shamans tend to reside in hovels - mouldy lairs deep underground and surrounded by fungal patches.

short_description.last_approved_text: If a camp is "stayin’ put" Gobbos will be sent out to dig a ditch around it as a basic defence.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: If a camp is "stayin’ put" Gobbos will be sent out to dig a ditch around it as a basic defence.

short_description.last_approved_text: Large stakes of pointy wood and other ramshackle defences of timber and bone are surpassingly effective.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Large stakes of pointy wood and other ramshackle defences of timber and bone are surpassingly effective.

short_description.last_approved_text: A big wall is a good way of stopping an enemy from "gettin’ in".

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A big wall is a good way of stopping an enemy from "gettin’ in".

short_description.last_approved_text: A few Goblins have a base understanding of concepts such as physics - much to the disgust of their fellow Greenskins!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A few Goblins have a base understanding of concepts such as physics - much to the disgust of their fellow Greenskins!

short_description.last_approved_text: By making deadly war machines Goblins can grudgingly get the resources they need to make even "betta stuff".

building_short_description_texts.short_description: By making deadly war machines Goblins can grudgingly get the resources they need to make even "betta stuff".

short_description.last_approved_text: No one truly knows when and how Dragon Ogres gather, but they always assemble on ground sacred to their ancient pact.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: No one truly knows when and how Dragon Ogres gather, but they always assemble on ground sacred to their ancient pact.

short_description.last_approved_text: Where the Shaggoths go to invigorate themselves, standing upon mountain tops to bathe in the tempest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Where the Shaggoths go to invigorate themselves, standing upon mountain tops to bathe in the tempest.

short_description.last_approved_text: A forge, deep within the Chaos Wastes, is no mortal smithy. Likewise the Hellsmiths hammering in the fire.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A forge, deep within the Chaos Wastes, is no mortal smithy. Likewise the Hellsmiths hammering in the fire.

short_description.last_approved_text: Within the hell fires are the Daemonsmiths, creators of fell and ignoble machines; grim chariots pulled by grim creatures.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Within the hell fires are the Daemonsmiths, creators of fell and ignoble machines; grim chariots pulled by grim creatures.

short_description.last_approved_text: Giants stride the world, mostly in an intemperate stupor. Those that wander too far north are enslaved and corrupted by Chaos.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Giants stride the world, mostly in an intemperate stupor. Those that wander too far north are enslaved and corrupted by Chaos.

short_description.last_approved_text: Much like Warshrines, grisly trophies carried in the wake of Chaos Knights may attract the eyes of the Gods.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Much like Warshrines, grisly trophies carried in the wake of Chaos Knights may attract the eyes of the Gods.

short_description.last_approved_text: When a Chaos Knight's trophy haul becomes too large, a more permanent structure of bone and skulls is needed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When a Chaos Knight's trophy haul becomes too large, a more permanent structure of bone and skulls is needed.

short_description.last_approved_text: The preferred route of the magic-using servants of Chaos, an arcane vortex is for the damned alone to step into.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The preferred route of the magic-using servants of Chaos, an arcane vortex is for the damned alone to step into.

short_description.last_approved_text: A tear in the fabric of the mortal realm from which Daemons and other horrors can - and will - emerge.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A tear in the fabric of the mortal realm from which Daemons and other horrors can - and will - emerge.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Marauder tribes have no sense of place, wandering the northern wastes until drawn together by relics of power.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Marauder tribes have no sense of place, wandering the northern wastes until drawn together by relics of power.

short_description.last_approved_text: To prove their might they fight in the trial pit, from which only the chosen emerge.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To prove their might they fight in the trial pit, from which only the chosen emerge.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Marauders spar upon the bloody field, desperately hoping that the Ruinous Ones will notice and perhaps show their favour…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Marauders spar upon the bloody field, desperately hoping that the Ruinous Ones will notice and perhaps show their favour…

short_description.last_approved_text: The tribes of the far north set up camps, not for sustenance but for worship and bonding under Ruinous scrutiny.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The tribes of the far north set up camps, not for sustenance but for worship and bonding under Ruinous scrutiny.

short_description.last_approved_text: When warbands gather along tribal lines, they have likely been summoned by their Ruinous patrons.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When warbands gather along tribal lines, they have likely been summoned by their Ruinous patrons.

short_description.last_approved_text: Chaos' multifarious warbands range in size from small groups to veritable hordes.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Chaos' multifarious warbands range in size from small groups to veritable hordes.

short_description.last_approved_text: When the omens are strong, the Unholy Legion converges.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When the omens are strong, the Unholy Legion converges.

short_description.last_approved_text: Only Everchosen have sufficiently risen in power to command a true Warhost of Chaos.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Only Everchosen have sufficiently risen in power to command a true Warhost of Chaos.

short_description.last_approved_text: The lairs of Trolls are fetid and disgusting; the further north they are, the more disturbing they become.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The lairs of Trolls are fetid and disgusting; the further north they are, the more disturbing they become.

short_description.last_approved_text: By planting an icon in the ground, a siren call is sent forth that Chaos Warriors must heed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: By planting an icon in the ground, a siren call is sent forth that Chaos Warriors must heed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Glorifying acts before Ruinous altars are summoning rituals that draw the most powerful of the Gods' mortal followers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Glorifying acts before Ruinous altars are summoning rituals that draw the most powerful of the Gods' mortal followers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Warshrines attract the attention of the Chaos Gods, along with the mightiest of their mortal servants, for power attracts power.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Warshrines attract the attention of the Chaos Gods, along with the mightiest of their mortal servants, for power attracts power.

short_description.last_approved_text: A collection of infernal weaponry, some plundered from southlanders, some fashioned by the Hellsmiths.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A collection of infernal weaponry, some plundered from southlanders, some fashioned by the Hellsmiths.

short_description.last_approved_text: Within the damned reliquary is stored the true weapons of power, culled from temples and secret places beneath the world.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Within the damned reliquary is stored the true weapons of power, culled from temples and secret places beneath the world.

short_description.last_approved_text: Orcs like to eat, and they’re not choosey - game, enemy corpses and even their mates are all potential menu items!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Orcs like to eat, and they’re not choosey - game, enemy corpses and even their mates are all potential menu items!

short_description.last_approved_text: While Greenskins will eat meat raw - they certainly have the gnashers for it - they do, in general, prefer to have it cooked.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: While Greenskins will eat meat raw - they certainly have the gnashers for it - they do, in general, prefer to have it cooked.

short_description.last_approved_text: Squigs are choice morsels – there aren't many Orcs that can turn down a roasted one!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Squigs are choice morsels – there aren't many Orcs that can turn down a roasted one!

short_description.last_approved_text: Greenskins love to fight, as we all know, but there are more mundane tasks that still must be performed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Greenskins love to fight, as we all know, but there are more mundane tasks that still must be performed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Even the Orcs realise that for wood to be a building material you need to do more than pick it up off the floor.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Even the Orcs realise that for wood to be a building material you need to do more than pick it up off the floor.

short_description.last_approved_text: Sawn into boards, wood is ready for use in war engines, fencing, huts, and even just planks for spanking unruly gits!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Sawn into boards, wood is ready for use in war engines, fencing, huts, and even just planks for spanking unruly gits!

short_description.last_approved_text: This city lies in ruins. Nothing remains but destruction, ashes and the sorrowful taste of defeat.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This city lies in ruins. Nothing remains but destruction, ashes and the sorrowful taste of defeat.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Father of Bears cares little for grand edifices, but in Kislev bear caves or standing stones are considered sacred.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Father of Bears cares little for grand edifices, but in Kislev bear caves or standing stones are considered sacred.

short_description.last_approved_text: Shrines to Ursen are rare, but temples are even rarer, with only the sacred groves in the capital and Erengrad known.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Shrines to Ursen are rare, but temples are even rarer, with only the sacred groves in the capital and Erengrad known.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Whether man-made or natural, a harbour is a place for vessels to wait out Stromfel's rage.

short_description.last_approved_text: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

short_description.last_approved_text: A shrine to Ulric, the God of Wolves, Winter and Battles and the patron of Middenland.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A shrine to Ulric, the God of Wolves, Winter and Battles and the patron of Middenland.

short_description.last_approved_text: Normally found in northern towns and cities, the temples of Ulric answer to the great castle-shrine in Middenheim.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Normally found in northern towns and cities, the temples of Ulric answer to the great castle-shrine in Middenheim.

short_description.last_approved_text: Norsemen guard their possessions and keep themselves safe from the harsh land's many predators.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Norsemen guard their possessions and keep themselves safe from the harsh land's many predators.

short_description.last_approved_text: Watch Towers are erected if a settlement grows to the extent that it is considered worth guarding against external terrors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Watch Towers are erected if a settlement grows to the extent that it is considered worth guarding against external terrors.

short_description.last_approved_text: For a Marauder, a drawn weapon must taste blood, unless he is sparring with younger tribesmen to ready them for combat.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For a Marauder, a drawn weapon must taste blood, unless he is sparring with younger tribesmen to ready them for combat.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Chieftain's chosen Warriors and Huscarls sit apart from the rest of the tribe in their own camp, as befits their status.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Chieftain's chosen Warriors and Huscarls sit apart from the rest of the tribe in their own camp, as befits their status.

short_description.last_approved_text: Often formed from the upturned hulls of old longships, a hall is where a Chieftain will feast and receive visitors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Often formed from the upturned hulls of old longships, a hall is where a Chieftain will feast and receive visitors.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Norse tribes are mainly nomadic, making their camps where they may and moving on when the dark energies wane.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Norse tribes are mainly nomadic, making their camps where they may and moving on when the dark energies wane.

short_description.last_approved_text: During a gathering of tribes or 'moot', many sacrifices are thrown into a large fire pit as the Chieftains parley.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: During a gathering of tribes or 'moot', many sacrifices are thrown into a large fire pit as the Chieftains parley.

short_description.last_approved_text: The most permanent Norse settlement is a shanty village, close to a wharf, with a crude meeting hall at its centre.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The most permanent Norse settlement is a shanty village, close to a wharf, with a crude meeting hall at its centre.

short_description.last_approved_text: Smiths are usually thralls, stolen from the south and kept alive for their skills, with access to a very basic smithy.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Smiths are usually thralls, stolen from the south and kept alive for their skills, with access to a very basic smithy.

short_description.last_approved_text: Taken from the steppes of the Northern Wastes, Norse steeds are kept at crude shielings, feeding on diluted blood.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Taken from the steppes of the Northern Wastes, Norse steeds are kept at crude shielings, feeding on diluted blood.

short_description.last_approved_text: In tribal villages, steeds are kept in corrals, which stops them from wandering too far and becoming Manticore quarry.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In tribal villages, steeds are kept in corrals, which stops them from wandering too far and becoming Manticore quarry.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Chaos Gods exist, as undeniable as the night. They are worshipped at Ruinous Altars, intended for sacrifice and more.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Chaos Gods exist, as undeniable as the night. They are worshipped at Ruinous Altars, intended for sacrifice and more.

short_description.last_approved_text: The larger a village becomes, the more significant and vile its shrine to the Dark Gods.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The larger a village becomes, the more significant and vile its shrine to the Dark Gods.

short_description.last_approved_text: Goblin Big Bosses have a big tent, bigga than the lads’ tents with more skulls on it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Goblin Big Bosses have a big tent, bigga than the lads’ tents with more skulls on it.

short_description.last_approved_text: A status symbol, a show of the Boss’ rising power and a place he can "ang me boots".

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A status symbol, a show of the Boss’ rising power and a place he can "ang me boots".

short_description.last_approved_text: Goblins have keener sight than Orcs, so the "scrawny gits" generally man the watch towers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Goblins have keener sight than Orcs, so the "scrawny gits" generally man the watch towers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Orcs that get guard duty are not the Boss’ chosen boyz, they probably skulked at the back during a charge.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Orcs that get guard duty are not the Boss’ chosen boyz, they probably skulked at the back during a charge.

short_description.last_approved_text: Bone is a plentiful material for the Savage Orcs, and they use it all manner of ways.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Bone is a plentiful material for the Savage Orcs, and they use it all manner of ways.

short_description.last_approved_text: The bone crafter dwelling is easily recognisable due to all the clattering bone fetishes that hang from its roof.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The bone crafter dwelling is easily recognisable due to all the clattering bone fetishes that hang from its roof.

short_description.last_approved_text: Naturally, the Savage Orc Warboss’ favoured bone carver gets to work in the Hut of Bones.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Naturally, the Savage Orc Warboss’ favoured bone carver gets to work in the Hut of Bones.

short_description.last_approved_text: The boyz need big open spaces to swing their choppas about.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The boyz need big open spaces to swing their choppas about.

short_description.last_approved_text: A large area set aside for the belligerent gits to slap each other about.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A large area set aside for the belligerent gits to slap each other about.

short_description.last_approved_text: This is where Big ‘Uns are forged and many teef lost to gambling.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This is where Big ‘Uns are forged and many teef lost to gambling.

short_description.last_approved_text: Savage Orcs are nomadic, but there are certain areas, deep in the Badlands, where they gather.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Savage Orcs are nomadic, but there are certain areas, deep in the Badlands, where they gather.

short_description.last_approved_text: A Savage Orc camp is an even more disorganised rabble of tents than a traditional Orc settlement.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A Savage Orc camp is an even more disorganised rabble of tents than a traditional Orc settlement.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Savage Orcs can Waaagh! just like any Greenskin, giving thanks to Gork or Mork before charging off.

short_description.last_approved_text: While the Archecclesiastium is technically the governing council of Myrmidia's cult, it has become the main temple's name by association.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: While the Archecclesiastium is technically the governing council of Myrmidia's cult, it has become the main temple's name by association.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Knights of the Blazing Sun are dedicated to Myrmidia, their large chapter house emblazoned with her likeness.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Knights of the Blazing Sun are dedicated to Myrmidia, their large chapter house emblazoned with her likeness.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Bokha Palace is the seat of the ruling Tzars, a whole wing of which is fashioned from Ice Magic.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Bokha Palace is the seat of the ruling Tzars, a whole wing of which is fashioned from Ice Magic.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Lady herself blessed the Morceaux Valley, washing the land with crystal water from the Grail.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Lady herself blessed the Morceaux Valley, washing the land with crystal water from the Grail.

short_description.last_approved_text: The finest Bretonnian wines can be found in the Bordeleaux dukedom and the finest grapes in the Morceaux Valley.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The finest Bretonnian wines can be found in the Bordeleaux dukedom and the finest grapes in the Morceaux Valley.

short_description.last_approved_text: Vintners gather the grapes blessed by the Lady, turning them into wine for future generations.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Vintners gather the grapes blessed by the Lady, turning them into wine for future generations.

short_description.last_approved_text: The wine market is a bustling and often dangerous place, as casks and bottles of the best vintages are sold for many gold coins.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The wine market is a bustling and often dangerous place, as casks and bottles of the best vintages are sold for many gold coins.

short_description.last_approved_text: Brightstone is highly valuable. It's therefore a pity that the mines at Mount Gunbad are infested with Night Goblins.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Brightstone is highly valuable. It's therefore a pity that the mines at Mount Gunbad are infested with Night Goblins.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Altdorf Colleges of Magic teach gifted students from across the Old World in the ways of Battle Magic.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Altdorf Colleges of Magic teach gifted students from across the Old World in the ways of Battle Magic.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Altdorf Colleges of Magic teach gifted students from across the Old World in the ways of Battle Magic.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Altdorf Colleges of Magic teach gifted students from across the Old World in the ways of Battle Magic.

short_description.last_approved_text: Surrounding the colleges are many conclaves, unions and societies where Wizards share knowledge and secrets.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Surrounding the colleges are many conclaves, unions and societies where Wizards share knowledge and secrets.
