building_short_description_texts.short_description: Surrounding the colleges are many conclaves, unions and societies where Wizards share knowledge and secrets.

short_description.last_approved_text: There are many docks in Erengrad - the 'Doorway to Kislev' - goods arrive here from Bretonnia, Marienburg and even Norsca.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There are many docks in Erengrad - the 'Doorway to Kislev' - goods arrive here from Bretonnia, Marienburg and even Norsca.

short_description.last_approved_text: Known simply as "the harbour", Erengrad is one of the largest ports, despite being under the control of its infamous Guilds.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Known simply as "the harbour", Erengrad is one of the largest ports, despite being under the control of its infamous Guilds.

short_description.last_approved_text: The port encompasses the harbour and docks, from the bay to the mouth of the Lynsk.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The port encompasses the harbour and docks, from the bay to the mouth of the Lynsk.

short_description.last_approved_text: This city lies in ruins. Nothing remains but destruction, ashes and the sorrowful taste of defeat.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This city lies in ruins. Nothing remains but destruction, ashes and the sorrowful taste of defeat.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Slayer Hold of Karak Kadrin houses the greatest shrine to the Ancestor God, Grimnir, the first Slayer.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Slayer Hold of Karak Kadrin houses the greatest shrine to the Ancestor God, Grimnir, the first Slayer.

short_description.last_approved_text: Sat atop the Ulricsberg, the fortress-temple at the heart of Middenheim dominates the city.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Sat atop the Ulricsberg, the fortress-temple at the heart of Middenheim dominates the city.

short_description.last_approved_text: "Da Dropz" are where the Orcs like to relieve themselves; they particularly enjoy doing it in enemy settlements.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "Da Dropz" are where the Orcs like to relieve themselves; they particularly enjoy doing it in enemy settlements.

short_description.last_approved_text: Greenskins like to "let da world know" a place has been conquered in the strongest (and stinkiest) way possible!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Greenskins like to "let da world know" a place has been conquered in the strongest (and stinkiest) way possible!

short_description.last_approved_text: When a heap of crap isn't humiliating enough, the Greenskins can really "go for it" with a towering pillar of the stuff!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When a heap of crap isn't humiliating enough, the Greenskins can really "go for it" with a towering pillar of the stuff!

short_description.last_approved_text: A stinky idol is not only a message to the enemy but a tribute to Mork (or Gork), using readily available materials.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A stinky idol is not only a message to the enemy but a tribute to Mork (or Gork), using readily available materials.

short_description.last_approved_text: A Troll's face made out of poo can be an intimidating thing to come across, depending on the quality of the "sculpture" of course.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A Troll's face made out of poo can be an intimidating thing to come across, depending on the quality of the "sculpture" of course.

short_description.last_approved_text: Where the Throne of Power lies when in residence; where the High King sits reading the Dammaz Kron.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Where the Throne of Power lies when in residence; where the High King sits reading the Dammaz Kron.

short_description.last_approved_text: Knights Panther chapter houses are located deep within Middenland, although detachments can be found in armies across the Empire.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Knights Panther chapter houses are located deep within Middenland, although detachments can be found in armies across the Empire.

short_description.last_approved_text: Marienburg is not a safe place in which to loiter, although the riches that pass through make it worth the risk.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Marienburg is not a safe place in which to loiter, although the riches that pass through make it worth the risk.

short_description.last_approved_text: The greater harbour of Marienburg lies past the Manannspoort Sea, just beyond Rijker's Isle.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The greater harbour of Marienburg lies past the Manannspoort Sea, just beyond Rijker's Isle.

short_description.last_approved_text: Marienburg's infamous port, the Rijkspoort, is where the majority of the 'legitimate' goods arrive.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Marienburg's infamous port, the Rijkspoort, is where the majority of the 'legitimate' goods arrive.

short_description.last_approved_text: This city lies in ruins. Nothing remains but destruction, ashes and the sorrowful taste of defeat.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This city lies in ruins. Nothing remains but destruction, ashes and the sorrowful taste of defeat.

short_description.last_approved_text: The foundry districts of Nuln are full of choking soot, as the forges burn night and day churning out Imperial artillery.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The foundry districts of Nuln are full of choking soot, as the forges burn night and day churning out Imperial artillery.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Gunnery School is a centre of excellence, where the nation's greatest artillerymen are trained and cannons forged.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Gunnery School is a centre of excellence, where the nation's greatest artillerymen are trained and cannons forged.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Reiksguard is barracked in Altdorf. However, they maintain battle-ready fortresses scattered throughout the Empire.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Reiksguard is barracked in Altdorf. However, they maintain battle-ready fortresses scattered throughout the Empire.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Savage Orcs are nomadic, but there are certain areas, deep in the Badlands, where they gather.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A Savage Orc camp is an even more disorganised rabble of tents than a traditional Orc settlement.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Savage Orcs can Waaagh! just like any Greenskin, giving thanks to Gork or Mork before charging off.

short_description.last_approved_text: The current capital of the Empire and seat of the Reikland Emperors. Altdorf is a large, cosmopolitan city-port full of wonders and danger.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The current capital of the Empire and seat of the Reikland Emperors. Altdorf is a large, cosmopolitan city-port full of wonders and danger.

short_description.last_approved_text: Once the proud Hold of Karak Drazh, it is now the most formidable of Orc Strongholds, in the hands of the Red Fang tribe, until very recently.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Once the proud Hold of Karak Drazh, it is now the most formidable of Orc Strongholds, in the hands of the Red Fang tribe, until very recently.

short_description.last_approved_text: Drakenhof is the sprawling ancestral fortress of the von Carstein bloodline. Ever since the coming of Vlad it has been the de facto political centre of Sylvania.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Drakenhof is the sprawling ancestral fortress of the von Carstein bloodline. Ever since the coming of Vlad it has been the de facto political centre of Sylvania.

short_description.last_approved_text: Formed in an ancient Elven stronghold many centuries ago, the city of Couronne houses the palace and ruling court of King Leoncoeur.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Formed in an ancient Elven stronghold many centuries ago, the city of Couronne houses the palace and ruling court of King Leoncoeur.

short_description.last_approved_text: Karaz-a-Karak, known as Everpeak, capital of the Karaz Ankor. It is the richest, deepest, and most powerful of all Dwarfholds.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Karaz-a-Karak, known as Everpeak, capital of the Karaz Ankor. It is the richest, deepest, and most powerful of all Dwarfholds.

short_description.last_approved_text: The nations of man enjoy a good tourney, especially the Bretonnians whose Knights relish showing off their skills to the smallfolk.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The nations of man enjoy a good tourney, especially the Bretonnians whose Knights relish showing off their skills to the smallfolk.

short_description.last_approved_text: Taal's shrines are rustic abodes, small circular buildings with conical roofs, topped with the skull of a stag.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Taal's shrines are rustic abodes, small circular buildings with conical roofs, topped with the skull of a stag.

short_description.last_approved_text: The greatest temple to Taal is found in Talabheim, the cratered city at the centre of the Empire.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The greatest temple to Taal is found in Talabheim, the cratered city at the centre of the Empire.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

short_description.last_approved_text: Whether man-made or natural, a harbour is a place for vessels to wait out Stromfel's rage.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Whether man-made or natural, a harbour is a place for vessels to wait out Stromfel's rage.

short_description.last_approved_text: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

short_description.last_approved_text: Shrines of Myrmidia can be found in most southern provinces. They are well ordered, martial places, as befits their deity.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Shrines of Myrmidia can be found in most southern provinces. They are well ordered, martial places, as befits their deity.

short_description.last_approved_text: Myrmidia's temples are some of the grandest structures in the southern nations, reflecting how liked the goddess is.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Myrmidia's temples are some of the grandest structures in the southern nations, reflecting how liked the goddess is.

short_description.last_approved_text: Located in the barrows or tombs of long-dead Chieftains are dusty racks of aged weaponry, still sharp despite the centuries.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Located in the barrows or tombs of long-dead Chieftains are dusty racks of aged weaponry, still sharp despite the centuries.

short_description.last_approved_text: The most treasured and arcane possessions are kept in reliquaries, many made safe from looters… until now.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The most treasured and arcane possessions are kept in reliquaries, many made safe from looters… until now.

short_description.last_approved_text: Often seen on Corpse Carts, balefire braziers contain an infernal flame that spreads a foul contagion.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Often seen on Corpse Carts, balefire braziers contain an infernal flame that spreads a foul contagion.

short_description.last_approved_text: A balefire hearth is a larger structure than a mere brazier - a raging hellfire inferno contained in a large, unholy fire pit.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A balefire hearth is a larger structure than a mere brazier - a raging hellfire inferno contained in a large, unholy fire pit.

short_description.last_approved_text: Deep in the woods stands a hovel, surrounded by cruel fetishes. From its chimney pumps balefire smoke to wither the lands.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Deep in the woods stands a hovel, surrounded by cruel fetishes. From its chimney pumps balefire smoke to wither the lands.

short_description.last_approved_text: The crypts of Sylvania can be dangerous places, for ghouls lurk and feed on the rotting remains within.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The crypts of Sylvania can be dangerous places, for ghouls lurk and feed on the rotting remains within.

short_description.last_approved_text: To summon vile minions, a circle must be etched in the ground, with symbols of a dead language scrawled around it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To summon vile minions, a circle must be etched in the ground, with symbols of a dead language scrawled around it.

short_description.last_approved_text: An infernal lodestone is planted inside a binding circle, summoning the most powerful of all spirits as it glows.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: An infernal lodestone is planted inside a binding circle, summoning the most powerful of all spirits as it glows.

short_description.last_approved_text: Graveyards and cemeteries are ubiquitous - a particular favourite source of "fresh recruits" for Necromancers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Graveyards and cemeteries are ubiquitous - a particular favourite source of "fresh recruits" for Necromancers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ancient warriors are found in barrows, usually at the sites of forgotten battles or the former seats of long-dead Chieftains.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Ancient warriors are found in barrows, usually at the sites of forgotten battles or the former seats of long-dead Chieftains.

short_description.last_approved_text: The richer and more powerful the warrior, the grander his tomb. Such mausoleums contain great prizes for Dark Magic wielders.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The richer and more powerful the warrior, the grander his tomb. Such mausoleums contain great prizes for Dark Magic wielders.

short_description.last_approved_text: The trees in Sylvania are as evil as its denizens, for they shelter many predators such as Fell Bats and Dire Wolves.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The trees in Sylvania are as evil as its denizens, for they shelter many predators such as Fell Bats and Dire Wolves.

short_description.last_approved_text: Sylvania's woods are dingy copses of twisted, half-rotted trees that claw what nourishment they can from the bone-strewn soil.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Sylvania's woods are dingy copses of twisted, half-rotted trees that claw what nourishment they can from the bone-strewn soil.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dark and yellow-leafed forests surround the wind-swept moors of Sylvania, where criminals and far darker, hungrier, things lurk.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dark and yellow-leafed forests surround the wind-swept moors of Sylvania, where criminals and far darker, hungrier, things lurk.

short_description.last_approved_text: A pile of writhing corpses from which a shambling patrol of Zombies will emerge.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A pile of writhing corpses from which a shambling patrol of Zombies will emerge.

short_description.last_approved_text: Throughout the cursed realm stand watchtowers of bone. Within are the Grave Guard - always on duty and ready to strike.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Throughout the cursed realm stand watchtowers of bone. Within are the Grave Guard - always on duty and ready to strike.

short_description.last_approved_text: From private collections to tomes gathered in temple vaults, Necromancers will do anything to seek our forbidden lore.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From private collections to tomes gathered in temple vaults, Necromancers will do anything to seek our forbidden lore.

short_description.last_approved_text: Any Necromancer worth his infamy needs a dread tower from which to conduct blasphemous experiments and research.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Any Necromancer worth his infamy needs a dread tower from which to conduct blasphemous experiments and research.

short_description.last_approved_text: This mass grave acts like a locus for Necromancers and their ilk, for it contains many fresh bodies ripe for recruitment.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This mass grave acts like a locus for Necromancers and their ilk, for it contains many fresh bodies ripe for recruitment.

short_description.last_approved_text: A vile place of discarded gravestones, statuary, rotting limbs, headless bodies that still crawl, and lots and lots of bones.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A vile place of discarded gravestones, statuary, rotting limbs, headless bodies that still crawl, and lots and lots of bones.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ossuaries are the resting places of skeletal remains, originally reserved for Morr's greatest subjects, but long since defiled.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Ossuaries are the resting places of skeletal remains, originally reserved for Morr's greatest subjects, but long since defiled.

short_description.last_approved_text: A common sight across Sylvania and beyond, the gibbet - or hanging cage - is where the living who displease their Undead lords often end up.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A common sight across Sylvania and beyond, the gibbet - or hanging cage - is where the living who displease their Undead lords often end up.

short_description.last_approved_text: Another common sight in the Unliving realms are gallows - although hanged corpses rarely stay dead and can often be seen struggling to untie their nooses.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Another common sight in the Unliving realms are gallows - although hanged corpses rarely stay dead and can often be seen struggling to untie their nooses.

short_description.last_approved_text: Deep in the red pits can be found mercury in the raw form of cinnabar. A material often used in Dark Magic rituals.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Deep in the red pits can be found mercury in the raw form of cinnabar. A material often used in Dark Magic rituals.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Blood Mines are red as cinnabar - and occasionally Warpstone - are found here in significant seams.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Blood Mines are red as cinnabar - and occasionally Warpstone - are found here in significant seams.

short_description.last_approved_text: Best not choose the dark green powder, though, it certainly isn't snuff!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Best not choose the dark green powder, though, it certainly isn't snuff!

short_description.last_approved_text: To hunt here is to become the hunted, for the prey is vicious and probably dead already…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To hunt here is to become the hunted, for the prey is vicious and probably dead already…

short_description.last_approved_text: Should the smallfolk organise themselves, a whole expedition will venture into the haunted woods in search of game.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Should the smallfolk organise themselves, a whole expedition will venture into the haunted woods in search of game.

short_description.last_approved_text: What is the Flayer? A myth, but one that is all too real.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: What is the Flayer? A myth, but one that is all too real.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gold found here is always tarnished and far from the pure element so beloved by Dwarfs. Nevertheless, it has value.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gold found here is always tarnished and far from the pure element so beloved by Dwarfs. Nevertheless, it has value.

short_description.last_approved_text: When a Vampire Count discovers a large seam of gold, he will send his minions forth to scour it clean.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When a Vampire Count discovers a large seam of gold, he will send his minions forth to scour it clean.

short_description.last_approved_text: A great furnace with an ornate, brazen face, and yellow-green balefire within its sneering mouth.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A great furnace with an ornate, brazen face, and yellow-green balefire within its sneering mouth.

short_description.last_approved_text: The blackest iron ore can be found in the deepest pits, underneath the mountains upon which gothic castles perch.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The blackest iron ore can be found in the deepest pits, underneath the mountains upon which gothic castles perch.

short_description.last_approved_text: Since before the building of Nagashizzar, Necromancers have used Zombies to burrow and mine mountains for their minerals.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Since before the building of Nagashizzar, Necromancers have used Zombies to burrow and mine mountains for their minerals.

short_description.last_approved_text: Cursed iron ore is laced with Warpstone. Such mines are prized.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Cursed iron ore is laced with Warpstone. Such mines are prized.

short_description.last_approved_text: Burning with balefire, an unholy forge is a relic of Stirland's more prosperous days, now defiled and used by a Vampire's thralls.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Burning with balefire, an unholy forge is a relic of Stirland's more prosperous days, now defiled and used by a Vampire's thralls.

short_description.last_approved_text: The dread castles of Sylvania are made from stone shaped by stone cutters, under von Carstein's thrall.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The dread castles of Sylvania are made from stone shaped by stone cutters, under von Carstein's thrall.

short_description.last_approved_text: There is an art to creating a memorable tombstone or grand mausoleum.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There is an art to creating a memorable tombstone or grand mausoleum.

short_description.last_approved_text: Some gargoyles are fashioned by sculptors - others just appear, as if they flew there themselves.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Some gargoyles are fashioned by sculptors - others just appear, as if they flew there themselves.

short_description.last_approved_text: The low-born of Sylvania that have heartbeats must still make a living. Most do in the cursed fields, tending to withering crops.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The low-born of Sylvania that have heartbeats must still make a living. Most do in the cursed fields, tending to withering crops.

short_description.last_approved_text: Sylvanian peasants tend to wretched farms, continuing the pretence that the realm's nobles are kind and generous lords.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Sylvanian peasants tend to wretched farms, continuing the pretence that the realm's nobles are kind and generous lords.

short_description.last_approved_text: At night, the mill by the blood-clotted streams begins to turn, mixing grains with grinded bone.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: At night, the mill by the blood-clotted streams begins to turn, mixing grains with grinded bone.

short_description.last_approved_text: Beneath the blood-clotted streams and rank sewage are pits of dense, dark clay.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Beneath the blood-clotted streams and rank sewage are pits of dense, dark clay.

short_description.last_approved_text: Using the raw clay compound, urn makers create opulent vessels to carry the ashes of powerful beings.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Using the raw clay compound, urn makers create opulent vessels to carry the ashes of powerful beings.

short_description.last_approved_text: Perhaps there is some spirit trapped within, burning in abject agony every time the kilns are lit?

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Perhaps there is some spirit trapped within, burning in abject agony every time the kilns are lit?

short_description.last_approved_text: Stagnant ponds can be found by their disgusting reek, the brackish water full of brine and other things…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Stagnant ponds can be found by their disgusting reek, the brackish water full of brine and other things…

short_description.last_approved_text: The only thing that rises from the crumbling salt marshes of Sylvania are bony hands reaching toward the sky.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The only thing that rises from the crumbling salt marshes of Sylvania are bony hands reaching toward the sky.

short_description.last_approved_text: Deep in the dead marches are salt pans, containing piles and piles of bones, bleached and scoured white.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Deep in the dead marches are salt pans, containing piles and piles of bones, bleached and scoured white.

short_description.last_approved_text: Foresting in Hunger Wood or the Spider Haunts is surely a fool's job?

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Foresting in Hunger Wood or the Spider Haunts is surely a fool's job?

short_description.last_approved_text: Once part of Stirland's burgeoning timber industry, the sawmills have remained in a ruined, yet operational state since the Vampire Wars…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Once part of Stirland's burgeoning timber industry, the sawmills have remained in a ruined, yet operational state since the Vampire Wars…

short_description.last_approved_text: From the ruined sawmills, Zombie bearers transport their cursed loads to large sheds long-thought abandoned by mortals.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From the ruined sawmills, Zombie bearers transport their cursed loads to large sheds long-thought abandoned by mortals.

short_description.last_approved_text: There is a cabin in the woods… a place where someone, or thing, keeps certain other things…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There is a cabin in the woods… a place where someone, or thing, keeps certain other things…

short_description.last_approved_text: There is a cabin in the woods, you know, where darkness dwells eternally…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There is a cabin in the woods, you know, where darkness dwells eternally…

short_description.last_approved_text: When a Vampire drinks an "aged red" from a wine glass, chances are it hasn't been made from grapes…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When a Vampire drinks an "aged red" from a wine glass, chances are it hasn't been made from grapes…

short_description.last_approved_text: Sylvanian orchards contain low-hanging, spooky trees, whose thorny branches are as likely to grab a passer-by as provide fruit.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Sylvanian orchards contain low-hanging, spooky trees, whose thorny branches are as likely to grab a passer-by as provide fruit.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Vampire Counts crave the illusion that they are nobles, and so they bottle their own "special" vintages.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Vampire Counts crave the illusion that they are nobles, and so they bottle their own "special" vintages.

short_description.last_approved_text: The scattered hamlets of Sylvania are even more isolated, parochial and pathetic than those of the Empire.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The scattered hamlets of Sylvania are even more isolated, parochial and pathetic than those of the Empire.

short_description.last_approved_text: The peasantry live in small communities of inter-related families, and never venture far from their hovels.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The peasantry live in small communities of inter-related families, and never venture far from their hovels.

short_description.last_approved_text: Townships are little more than larger villages, usually within sight of a grand castle - its shadow looming over the terrified denizens.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Townships are little more than larger villages, usually within sight of a grand castle - its shadow looming over the terrified denizens.

short_description.last_approved_text: When a Vampire marches forth, the cities of other realms fear - for should the Night Lord invade they become accursed places.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When a Vampire marches forth, the cities of other realms fear - for should the Night Lord invade they become accursed places.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dread, gothic citadels are scattered throughout Sylvania. They grow more ominous as their chief resident grows in power.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dread, gothic citadels are scattered throughout Sylvania. They grow more ominous as their chief resident grows in power.

short_description.last_approved_text: Within the tomb of the Vampire lies its coffin, filled with loam from Lahmia. It is where the beast rests, waiting to be awoken…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Within the tomb of the Vampire lies its coffin, filled with loam from Lahmia. It is where the beast rests, waiting to be awoken…

short_description.last_approved_text: A Vampire's keep is quite literally its castle - a dark, gothic stronghold from which it plots and assembles its forces.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A Vampire's keep is quite literally its castle - a dark, gothic stronghold from which it plots and assembles its forces.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gory fetishes are used to chain spirits to the insubstantial barriers known as ghost fences. To cross it without wards is a foolish act.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gory fetishes are used to chain spirits to the insubstantial barriers known as ghost fences. To cross it without wards is a foolish act.

short_description.last_approved_text: Walls of wood, stone, bone and skulls are used by the master of the Undead to form defences and instil terror.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Walls of wood, stone, bone and skulls are used by the master of the Undead to form defences and instil terror.

short_description.last_approved_text: Larger walls form mighty bulwarks that can be infused with Dark Magic to keep out and curse the enemy.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Larger walls form mighty bulwarks that can be infused with Dark Magic to keep out and curse the enemy.

short_description.last_approved_text: Honour mine father in death as in life…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Honour mine father in death as in life…
